items.name: Chinese Firecracker
items.description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained, but stockpiles may still be used in Trials.)

A row of small explosive devices wrapped in heavy paper casing.
Can be used as a distraction, as a blinding device or to celebrate.

  • Press the Use Item button to detonate the Firecracker.
  • Detonates into loud bangs and intense light flashes, temporarily blinding and deafening nearby Players.

The Chinese Firecracker is consumed on use.

The Chinese Firecracker is only available during Lunar Events.

items.name: Third Year Party Starter
items.description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained, but stockpiles may still be used in Trials.)

A small, highly-explosive dinner table decoration.
Can be used as a distraction, as a blinding device or to celebrate our three years together.

  • Press the Use Item button to detonate the Firecracker.
  • Detonates into loud bangs and intense light flashes, temporarily blinding and deafening nearby Players.

The Third Year Party Starter is consumed on use.

The Third Year Party Starter was only available during the Third Year Anniversary Event.

""Happy Anniversary! Here is to our three years together!" — The Dead by Daylight Team"

items.name: Winter Party Starter
items.description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained, but stockpiles may still be used in Trials.)

A small, highly-explosive dinner table decoration.
Can be used as a distraction, as a blinding device or to celebrate.

  • Press the Use Item button to detonate the Firecracker.
  • Detonates into loud bangs and intense light flashes, temporarily blinding and deafening nearby Players.

The Winter Party Starter is consumed on use.

The Winter Party Starter is only available during Winter Events.

items.name: Flashlight
items.description:
A standard Flashlight.
Can be used to light your way in the darkness.
  • Press the Use Item button to light the Flashlight for up to 8 seconds.

"Most of the battery life was wastefully used by the previous owner."

items.name: Sport Flashlight
items.description:
A very portable Flashlight with a good grip.
Its efficient technology produces a powerful light while consuming less power.
  • Press the Use Item button to light the Flashlight for up to 8 seconds.
  • Has an increased Aim accuracy of +20 %.
  • Has a reduced Depletion rate of -11 %.

items.name: Utility Flashlight
items.description:
A sturdy but heavy Flashlight that packs a lot of power.
  • Press the Use Item button to light the Flashlight for up to 12 seconds.
  • Has an increased Beam brightness of +30 %.
  • Has an increased Blindness duration of +15 %.
  • Has a reduced Aim accuracy of -20 %.

items.name: Anniversary Flashlight
items.description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained, but stockpiles may still be used in Trials.)

A festive Flashlight.

  • Press the Use Item button to light the Flashlight for up to 8 seconds.
  • Explodes with confetti upon blinding the Killer.
    Surprise!

The Anniversary Flashlight was only available during the Fourth and Fifth Year Anniversary Events.

""Happy Anniversary! Here is to many more!" — The Dead by Daylight Team"

items.name: Masquerade Flashlight
items.description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained, but stockpiles may still be used in Trials.)

Not even a mask can protect you from this Flashlight's bright beam.

  • Press the Use Item button to light the Flashlight for up to 8 seconds.

The Masquerade Flashlight is only available during Anniversary Events.

""Happy Anniversary! The future looks bright!" — The Dead by Daylight Team"

items.name: Will O' Wisp
items.description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained, but stockpiles may still be used in Trials.)

A Flashlight equipped with a special lens cover that adds an orange tint and a little Ghost to the beam.

  • Press the Use Item button to light the Flashlight for up to 8 seconds.
  • Causes more friendly Ghosts in your life.

The Will O' Wisp is only available during Halloween Events.

"Happy Trick or Treating!"

items.name: Apprentice's Fog Vial
items.description:
"Made by the hands of a diligent but timid novice."

Start the Trial with 2 Charges.
Press the Use Item button to release a concentrated Fog Cloud:

  • Expands to a maximum size of 8 metres over 2 seconds.
  • Lasts for 8 seconds.
  • Obscures visibility and sounds within its Area of Effect:
    • Has an opacity of 33 %.
    • Suppresses Auras and Scratch Marks.
Apprentice's Fog Vial takes 70 seconds to recharge after use.

items.name: Artisan's Fog Vial
items.description:
"Crafted by an experienced glazier with a love for her craft."

Start the Trial with 2 Charges.
Press the Use Item button to release a concentrated Fog Cloud:

  • Expands to a maximum size of 8 metres over 1.5 seconds.
  • Lasts for 10 seconds.
  • Obscures visibility and sounds within its Area of Effect:
    • Has an opacity of 33 %.
    • Suppresses Auras and Scratch Marks.
Artisan's Fog Vial takes 65 seconds to recharge after use.

items.name: Vigo's Fog Vial
items.description:
"From the man's own collection. Impeccable. Unparalleled."

Start the Trial with 2 Charges.
Press the Use Item button to release a concentrated Fog Cloud:

  • Expands to a maximum size of 8 metres over 1.2 seconds.
  • Lasts for 12 seconds.
  • Obscures visibility and sounds within its Area of Effect:
    • Has an opacity of 33 %.
    • Suppresses Auras and Scratch Marks.
Vigo's Fog Vial takes 60 seconds to recharge after use.

items.name: Broken Key
items.description:
"The bow and shank of a key, vibrating with power."

Start the Trial with 6 Charges.
Press and hold the Use Item button to channel the Broken Key:

  • The Auras of other Survivors within 48 metres of your location are revealed to you for 8 seconds.
The Broken Key consumes -1 Charge per use of its ability.

items.name: Dull Key
items.description:
"A bent and dull key that once held great power."

Start the Trial with 5 Charges.
Press and hold the Use Item button to channel the Dull Key:

  • The Auras of other Survivors within 56 metres of your location are revealed to you for 9 seconds.
While standing next to a locked Chest, press the Use Item button to quickly open it:
  • Guarantees an Item of Rare Rarity or higher.
  • The Aura of the Chest is revealed to other Survivors within 42 metres and highlighted in yellow:
    • Grants the ability for 1 other Survivor to Rummage through that Chest once.
    • Guarantees an Item of Rare Rarity or higher.
  • While performing the Rummage action, the Aura of that Survivor is revealed to the Key holder.
While standing next to the closed Hatch, press the Use Item button to re-open it:
  • Takes 2.5 seconds to open.
The Dull Key consumes -1 Charge per use of any one of its abilities.

items.name: Skeleton Key
items.description:
"A tarnished and crooked key, vibrating with ominous power."

Start the Trial with 6 Charges.
Press and hold the Use Item button to channel the Skeleton Key:

  • The Auras of other Survivors within 64 metres of your location are revealed to you for 10 seconds.
While standing next to a locked Chest, press the Use Item button to quickly open it:
  • Guarantees an Item of Rare Rarity or higher.
  • The Aura of the Chest is revealed to other Survivors within 42 metres and highlighted in yellow:
    • Grants the ability for 1 other Survivor to Rummage through that Chest once.
    • Guarantees an Item of Rare Rarity or higher.
  • While performing the Rummage action, the Aura of that Survivor is revealed to the Key holder.
While standing next to the closed Hatch, press the Use Item button to re-open it:
  • Takes 2.5 seconds to open.
The Skeleton Key consumes -1 Charge per use of any one of its abilities.

items.name: Cryptic Map
items.description:
"Looking at it, the directions make no sense.
But merely holding it grants you an uncanny intuition."

Start the Trial with 4 Charges.
Press the Use Item button to channel the Cryptic Map:

  • The Auras of Pallets and Windows within 24 metres of your location are revealed to you for 10 seconds.
While channelling the Map, press the Secondary Action button at any point before the timer elapses for the following additional effect:
  • Creates a Beam of Light at your current location that lasts for 16 seconds.
    • The Auras of Generators within 32 metres of it are revealed to all Survivors and highlighted in red.
The Cryptic Map consumes -1 Charge per use.

items.name: Scribbled Map
items.description:
"Peering at the parchment, a path appears in your mind.
Moments later, you feel lost again."

Start the Trial with 5 Charges.
Press the Use Item button to channel the Scribbled Map:

  • The Auras of Pallets and Windows within 32 metres of your location are revealed to you for 12 seconds.
While channelling the Map, press the Secondary Action button at any point before the timer elapses for the following additional effect:
  • Creates a Beam of Light at your current location that lasts for 16 seconds.
    • The Auras of Generators within 32 metres of it are revealed to all Survivors and highlighted in red.
The Scribbled Map consumes -1 Charge per use.

items.name: Annotated Map
items.description:
"The sketch is clear and detailed.
Strange knowledge flows into you, followed by dread uncertainty."

Start the Trial with 6 Charges.
Press the Use Item button to channel the Annotated Map:

  • The Auras of Pallets and Windows within 40 metres of your location are revealed to you for 14 seconds.
While channelling the Map, press the Secondary Action button at any point before the timer elapses for the following additional effect:
  • Creates a Beam of Light at your current location that lasts for 16 seconds.
    • The Auras of Generators within 32 metres of it are revealed to all Survivors and highlighted in red.
The Annotated Map consumes -1 Charge per use.

items.name: Bloodsense Map
items.description:
"A bloodstained piece of parchment, hastily rolled and burning with a strange power."

Start the Trial with 8 Charges.
Press the Use Item button to channel the Bloodsense Map:

  • The Auras of injured Survivors, Pallets, and Windows within 48 metres of your location are revealed to you for 14 seconds.
  • Causes Pools of Blood to spawn beneath you while being used.
While channelling the Map, press the Secondary Action button at any point before the timer elapses for the following additional effect:
  • Creates a Beam of Light at your current location that lasts for 16 seconds.
    • The Auras of Generators within 32 metres of it are revealed to all Survivors and highlighted in red.
The Bloodsense Map consumes -1 Charge per use.

items.name: Camping Aid Kit
items.description:
A rudimentary First Aid Kit which can save lives in emergencies, even if it's lacking some of its supplies.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:
  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +35 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The Camping Aid Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

"Barely has enough material for a decent patch-up."

items.name: First Aid Kit
items.description:
A standard First Aid Kit with all the necessary equipment for treating common to more serious injuries.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:
  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The First Aid Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

items.name: Emergency Med-Kit
items.description:
A sturdy and well organised Med-Kit equipped with top condition emergency supplies.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:
  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +45 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The Emergency Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

"There is a cure for almost everything...but not for this."

items.name: Ranger Med-Kit
items.description:
A large metal box containing medical supplies aimed at emergency rescues in hard to reach, often isolated locations.
Can be used to heal other Survivors:
  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +50 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The Ranger Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

"A small engraved label can be found glued to the back panel: VK.ID-3994723."

items.name: All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox
items.description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained, but stockpiles may still be used in Trials.)

A plastic lunchbox with phosphorescent Halloween Stickers that has been packed with First-Aid equipment.

  • Makes you considerably more visible.

Can be used to heal other Survivors:

  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

The All Hallows' Eve Lunchbox is only available during Halloween Events.

"Safety first! Make sure you can be seen when trick or treating."

items.name: Anniversary Med-Kit
items.description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained, but stockpiles may still be used in Trials.)

A festive Med-Kit that explodes with confetti upon fully healing a Survivor. Surprise!

  • Increased confetti of +100 %.

Can be used to heal other Survivors:

  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The Anniversary Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

The Anniversary Med-Kit was only available during the Fourth and Fifth Year Anniversary Events.

"Happy Anniversary! Here's to many more!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

items.name: Masquerade Med-Kit
items.description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained, but stockpiles may still be used in Trials.)

A festive Med-Kit with a shocking surprise, giving a whole new meaning to the term "Health Scare".

  • Increased confetti of +100 %.

Can be used to heal other Survivors:

  • Increased Altruistic Healing speed of +40 %.

Unlocks the Self-Heal action:

  • Reduced Personal Healing speed of -33 %.
  • Reduced Item efficiency of -33 %.

The Masquerade Med-Kit has a Capacity of 24 Charges.

The Masquerade Med-Kit is only available during Anniversary Events.

"Happy Anniversary! To your health!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

items.name: Worn-Out Tools
items.description:
A metal box containing out of condition tools that could break at any moment.
Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • 16 Charges.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +50 %.
  • Reduces the Success zone of Good Skill Checks by -10 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.

"You call these tools? ... Really?"

items.name: Toolbox
items.description:
Metal box containing a set of basic tools.
Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • 20 Charges.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +50 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed by +15 %.

"It is unclear as to where these tools come from. Were they brought in by one of us or did they belong to one of the monsters?"

items.name: Commodious Toolbox
items.description:
A large metal box containing basic tool and extra mechanical parts.
Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • 32 Charges.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +50 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed by +50 %.

items.name: Mechanic's Toolbox
items.description:
A metal box with specialised mechanics tools.
Even without training, can be used to repair or break various mechanical components.
  • 16 Charges.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +75 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed by +25 %.

items.name: Alex's Toolbox
items.description:
A metal box containing mainly saws and vice grips of varying sizes but also other tools.
Even though the content of this Toolbox is clearly aimed at destructive deeds, it can be used to repair various mechanical components as well.
  • 18 Charges.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +10 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed by +100 %.

"Most of the tools are identified as 'owned by Alex'."

items.name: Engineer's Toolbox
items.description:
A metal box with highly specialised tools meant for engineering.
Most of the tools can be used by neophytes to make quick repairs or break various mechanical components.
  • 16 Charges.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +100 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed by +10 %.

"I've created tools beyond compare and stood paralysed as they were stolen from me. These are but a poor replica, spat out by The Fog." — Vigo's Journal

items.name: Anniversary Toolbox
items.description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained, but stockpiles may still be used in Trials.)

A Toolbox that is slightly explosive.

  • 32 Charges.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +50 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed by +50 %.
  • Detonates a firework once depleted.
    Yay!

The Anniversary Toolbox was only available during the Fourth and Fifth Year Anniversary Events.

"Nothing says happy anniversary like detonating a firework and praying the Killer does not notice.
Good luck and thank you for celebrating with us!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

items.name: Festive Toolbox
items.description:
A Toolbox packed to the brim with fireworks, it is prepared to celebrate all your life's successes... and failures.
  • 32 Charges.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +50 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed by +50 %.
  • Succeeding a Great Skill Check detonates a small cluster of firecrackers.
  • Missing a Skill Check detonates fireworks.

The Festive Toolbox is only available during Spring Events.

items.name: Masquerade Toolbox
items.description:
THIS ITEM CAN NO LONGER BE OBTAINED FROM THE BLOODWEB (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained, but stockpiles may still be used in Trials.)

A Toolbox with all of the standard gadgets: wrenches, screwdrivers, fireworks, a hammer...

  • 32 Charges.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +50 %.
  • Unlocks the Sabotage action.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed by +50 %.
  • Detonates a firework once depleted.
    Yay!

The Masquerade Toolbox is only available during Anniversary Events.

"Happy Anniversary! We're fixin' to have a big party!" — The Dead by Daylight Team

items.name: Antidote
items.description:
Limited Item

A potent formula that reverses the effects of both the Uroboros and T-Virus infection.

  • Press the Use Item button to cure yourself or another Survivor from either or both infections.
  • Can be used 3 times before it is consumed.
  • Can be found in Supply Cases located in the environment.
The Antidote only spawns in 2v8 Trials featuring both The Mastermind and The Nemesis.

Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Blood Can
items.description:
Limited Item

The handle is slick, and blood wells between your fingers as you tighten your grip.
The Blood Can is found when interacting with the Blood Pump and required to carry the blood needed to repair Blood Generators:

  • Holds a maximum of 40 Litres of blood:
    • Loses -0.5 L/s when left on the ground.
    • Loses -0.7 L/s while running.
    • Loses -20 Litres when toppled over.
  • Running produces Pools of Blood.
  • Emits distinct noises while carried, which vary depending on your Movement speed and the number of Litres of blood being carried.
While filling the Blood Can at a Blood Pump, you benefit from the following effect:
  • The Aura of the nearest Blood Generator is revealed to you.
    • This effect lingers for 10 seconds.
The Blood Can vanishes from the Trial when empty and is only available during Spring Events.

Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Candelabra
items.description:
Limited Item

In the darkest of castles, any light is a precious commodity.

All Survivors start the Trial with a Candelabra held in hand.

  • Additional Candelabras may be found in Chests located in the environment.
  • The Auras of all Candelabras placed in the environment are revealed to all Survivors in white at all times.
  • Pushes back the Fog as a passive effect when held.
Press and hold the Use Item button while holding the Candelabra to benefit from the following effects:
  • 90 Charges.
  • The Aura of the nearest incomplete Generator is revealed to you.
  • The Survivor Activity HUD is displayed to you, but without any visible Progression.
Place the Candelabra on top of a Generator to benefit from the following effects:
  • The Aura of that Generator is revealed to all Survivors within 32 metres.
  • Completing that Generator causes it to suppress the Killer's ability to read the Auras of all remaining incomplete Generators for 15 seconds or until the Candelabra is removed from it by any means.
  • Can be destroyed by the Killer when placed on Generators.
The Candelabra is only available for use in the Lights Out - Castlevania Modifier Event.

Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: EMP
items.description:
Limited Item

An electromagnetic pulse device that is printed by Supply Cases when facing The Singularity.
The Auras of Supply Cases are visible when within 28 metres:

  • Takes 100 Charges to be printed.
    • Passive printing charges at a rate of +1 c/s, but is limited to 97 Charges, requiring the final 3 Charges to be actively printed by a Survivor.
    • Active printing charges at a rate of +4 c/s while a Survivor interacts with the Supply Case.
  • Takes 2.5 seconds to charge.
  • Incurs a -10 % Hindered Status Effect while charging and holding.
  • Has an Area of Effect of 10 metres.
  • Removes Temporal Slipstream from anyone within its Area of Effect upon detonation.
    • The Auras of other Slipstreamed Survivors are revealed to you in yellow when within the Area of Effect.
  • Disables all Biopods within the Area of Effect for 45 seconds upon detonation and grants immunity to Temporal Slipstream for 1 second.
Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Eye of Vecna
items.description:
Limited Vecna Item

Press the Use Item button to attune to the Eye of Vecna:

  • Triggers Killer Instinct for 3 seconds.
  • Grants The Lich the ability to kill you by his own hand, once you have accumulated 2 Hook Stages and are in the Dying State.
While healthy, you benefit from the following effect:
  • The Aura of whichever Locker is nearest to your current location is revealed to you and highlighted in yellow.
Perform a Rushed action to exit the highlighted Locker to activate a special ability:
  • Prevents your Aura from being revealed for 12 seconds.
  • Grants invisibility for 12 seconds.
  • Grants a +25 % Haste Status Effect for 12 seconds.
  • Causes you to suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 30 seconds.
The Eye of Vecna can retrieved from a Treasure Chests when rolling a 20 upon opening it.

Limited Vecna Items are depleted on use but kept on your person.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: First Aid Spray
items.description:
Limited Item

A medication that helps reverse the effects of an Uroboros infection.

  • Press the Use Item button to cure yourself or another Survivor.
  • Can be used 2 times before it is consumed.
  • Can be found in Supply Cases located in the environment.
Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Flash Grenade
items.description:
Craftable Limited Item

Craftable when using Flashbang.
Can be used as a distraction or blinding device.

  • Press the Use Item button to detonate the Flash Grenade.
  • Detonates with a loud bang and flashing lights, temporarily blinding and deafening any nearby Players.
  • Triggers a Loud Noise Notification.
Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Fog Crystal
items.description:
Limited Item

"Cold to the touch, the crystal vibrates from the force contained within."

Press the Use Item button to drop the Fog Crystal at your feet, causing it to shatter and release a thick fog with a radius of 4 metres:

  • Expands its Area of Effect from 2 metres to 6 metres over 1 second.
  • Lingers at its maximum radius for 8 seconds.
  • Shrinks and dissipates over 2 seconds.
Survivors inside the Area of Effect benefit from the following effect:
  • Suppresses the creation of their Scratch Marks.
The Fog Crystal has 1 Charge and can only be found in Chests during the 2v8 Event.

Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Fragile Mirror
items.description:
Limited Item

A fragile pocket mirror pulled from the first White Glyph.
Its surface is broken.

  • Must be carried to the Basement without performing any of the following interactions:
    • Rushed Actions of any kind.
    • Falling from height.
    • Dropping the Item.
  • Shatters when attempting to escape the Trial with it.
Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Glowing Fungus
items.description:
Limited Item

Spawns in the environment when facing The Krasue:

  • When spawned, takes 5 seconds to grow and become interactable.
  • Can be picked up by Survivors.
  • Reveals its Aura to all Survivors afflicted with Leeched within 128 metres.
Press the Use Item button to eat the mushroom:
  • Takes 3 seconds to complete.
  • Limits movement to walking.
  • Reduces the Walking speed to 70.8 % of its default value.
    • This effect lingers for 0.5 seconds.
After eating a Glowing Fungus, Survivors benefit from the following effect:
  • Depletes the Leeched Meter at a rate of -5 %/s.
    • This effect ends after being hit.
Dropping a Glowing Fungus on the ground causes it to decay within 5 seconds unless a Survivor is within 2.5 metres of its location.

Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Hand of Vecna
items.description:
Limited Vecna Item

Press the Use Item button to attune to the Hand of Vecna:

  • Triggers Killer Instinct for 5 seconds.
  • Grants The Lich the ability to kill you by his own hand, once you have accumulated 2 Hook Stages and are in the Dying State.
While healthy, you benefit from the following effect:
  • The Aura of whichever Locker is nearest to your current location is revealed to you and highlighted in yellow.
Perform a Rushed action to enter the highlighted Locker to activate a special ability:
  • Instantly teleports you to a different Locker at least 10 metres away.
  • Triggers a Loud Noise Notification at that location.
  • Removes 1 Health State.
  • Causes you to suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 30 seconds.
The Hand of Vecna can retrieved from a Treasure Chests when rolling a 20 upon opening it.

Limited Vecna Items are depleted on use but kept on your person.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Keycard
items.description:
Limited Item

Can only be found on the Nostromo Wreckage Map.

  • Crouch over the body of a dead cosmonaut found in the environment and press the Interaction button to pick up the Keycard.
  • Insert it into the terminal located by the Mass Hall to hack it.
    • Perform the Hack Terminal interaction by pressing the keybinds for Left, Down, Up, Right.
    • Hacking the terminal opens an airlock door to a secret room containing a Chest.
Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Lament Configuration
items.description:
Limited Item

Spawns in the environment when facing The Cenobite.

  • Starts a Chain Hunt after 90 seconds of spawning into the environment.
    • Starts it immediately when it is picked up by The Cenobite.
  • Reveals its Aura to all Survivors.
Can be picked up and carried by Survivors:
  • Resets the timer of the Lament Configuration and ends active Chain Hunts on other Survivors.
  • Press the Use Item button to solve the Lament Configuration, causing it to respawn in a new location.
    • Reveals your location to the The Cenobite while solving it through a special version of Killer Instinct and grants him the ability to teleport to you.
  • Causes the Oblivious Status Effect when carried.
Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Lantern
items.description:
THIS ITEM IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the current Game, but exists in the Game Code.)

The Lantern appears to be a non-Castlevania-themed version of the Candelabra.

It will likely feature the same or similar effects in future iterations of the Lights Out Modifier.

items.name: Pocket Mirror
items.description:
Limited Item

A repaired pocket mirror pulled from the second White Glyph.
Its surface is frosty.

  • Grants 25,000 bonus Bloodpoints upon escaping the Trial with it.
Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Remote Flame Turret
items.description:
Limited Item

A flamethrower turret that Survivors can retrieve from Control Stations and placed in the environment.

  • Tracks the presence of The Xenomorph within 41 metres of its location.
    • This ability is briefly disabled whenever The Xenomorph exits the Tunnels.
  • Grants immunity from Detection by The Xenomorph when it is inside the Tunnels while carrying the Turret.
  • Survivors suffer from a -35 % Hindered Status Effect, and the Exhausted and Incapacitated Status Effects, while carrying the Turret.
  • The Auras of Survivors carrying a Turret are revealed to all other Survivors.
  • Shoots flames at a Crawler Mode The Xenomorph when within 10 metres and established Line of Sight.
    • This slows The Xenomorph and knocks it out of Crawler Mode after filling the Power gauge.
    • Overheats after doing so or when firing consecutively for 4 seconds.
    • Overheated Turrets can be repaired and reactivated by Survivors.
    • Multiple Turrets firing simultaneously do not stack their damage output.
  • Dropping a Turret on the ground instead of deploying it destroys it after 30 seconds, unless at least one Survivor remains within 6 metres of where it was dropped.
  • Can be destroyed by an attack from The Xenomorph.
Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: VHS Tape
items.description:
Limited Item

The Cursed Tape can be retrieved from a TV located in the environment and must be reinserted into a specific one:

  • Inserting the Cursed Tape reduces Condemned by -3 Stacks.
    • This spreads The Onryō's message and temporarily turns the TV off.
  • The specific TV is highlighted in yellow.
Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Vaccine
items.description:
Limited Item

A vaccine that helps reverse the effects of a T-Virus infection.

  • Press the Use Item button to cure yourself or another Survivor.
  • Can be used 1 time before it is consumed.
  • Can be found in Supply Cases located in the environment.
Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Void Crystal
items.description:
Limited Item

Can be retrieved from the Void Well in exchange for 70 Void Energy and has 1 Charge.
Press the Use Item button to shatter the Void Crystal at your feet and release a thick Fog Cloud:

  • Expands to its maximum size of 4 metres over 1 second.
  • Lasts for 8 seconds.
  • Obscures visibility and sounds for all Players within its Area of Effect.
  • Grants special benefits to its user:
    • Grants them full invisibility while inside the Fog Cloud and their own Aura is revealed to them, highlighted in white.
    • Suppresses the creation of their Scratch Marks while within 2–6 metres of the centre of the Fog Cloud.
Press the Use Item button while standing next to an incomplete Generator to lay the Void Crystal atop of it:
  • Automatically repairs the Generator at a rate of 0.8 %/s for a maximum of 30 seconds.
    • This disables the ability to manually repair that Generator while active.
    • The Killer can stop the auto-repair prematurely by damaging that Generator, which destroys the Void Crystal.
The Void Crystal is only available during Halloween Events.

Limited Items are consumed on use.
They cannot be brought back to the Campfire after a Trial and are removed by The Entity upon exiting the Trial.

items.name: Trapple
items.description:
THIS ITEM IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the current Game, but exists in the Game Code.)

Unknown Description.

items.name: Lantern
items.description:
THIS ITEM IS UNUSED (This Unlockable is not used in the current Game, but exists in the Game Code.)

The Lantern appears to be a non-Castlevania-themed version of the Candelabra.

It will likely feature the same or similar effects in future iterations of the Lights Out Modifier.

addons.name: Blight Serum
addons.description:
THIS ADD-ON IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE (This Unlockable can no longer be obtained and stockpiles can no longer be used.
If it is an Event Unlockable, it may return with its associated Event.)

A small amount of Compound Thirty-Four, the final serum The Blight had worked on before his transformation.
Causes extreme mutations in high doses.

Playing as The Blight, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Grants 1 additional Token towards his Power.

Playing as any other Killer, Blighted Serum temporarily replaces your Power with the Blighted Rush ability.

  • Press the Power button to dash forwards at 200 % of your default Movement speed for 2.5 seconds.
  • Start the Trial with 1 Token.
  • Receive 1 Token each time a Survivor is hooked.

addons.name: Fingerless Parade Gloves
addons.description:
"Part of the standard Clown apparel, the cut fingers allow for dexterous manipulations."

Modifies the Bottles with the following effects:

  • Increases their Throw speed by #effect(1).
  • Reduces their Throw angle by #effect(2).

addons.name: Party Bottle
addons.description:
"Be the life of the party!"

Modifies the Tonic and Antidote with the following effects:

  • Bottles now release confetti upon breaking, in addition to their usual effects.
  • Direct hits with a Bottle grant 100 bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Scoring Category.

addons.name: Robin Feather
addons.description:
"A warm orange feather, soft to the touch."

You benefit from the following effect:

  • Reduces the Cool-down time after throwing a Bottle by -40 %.

addons.name: VHS Porn
addons.description:
"An all time classic.
You won't see things quite the same again."

Modifies the Tonic with the following effect:

  • Increases the size and spread of the Gas Clouds by +10 %.

addons.name: Kerosene Can
addons.description:
"A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled."

Survivors afflicted by the Tonic suffer from the following effect:

  • Causes the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

addons.name: Solvent Jug
addons.description:
"A chemical volatile compound that irritates the respiratory tract, but increases absorption of the Afterpiece Antidote."

Modifies the Antidote with the following effect:

  • Increases the duration of Invigoration by +1 second.

addons.name: Starling Feather
addons.description:
"A black feather with an emerald gloss, very soft to the touch."

You benefit from the following effect:

  • Reduces the Cool-down time after throwing a Bottle by -50 %.

addons.name: Sticky Soda Bottle
addons.description:
"It's sugary sweet, with only a little blood on the label."

Modifies the Antidote with the following effect:

  • Increases the strength of the Haste Status Effect by +2 % to +16 %.

addons.name: Thick Cork Stopper
addons.description:
"A sturdy cork fitting the Afterpiece Tonic Bottles marvellously."

You benefit from the following effect:

  • Reduces the Reloading time by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Bottle of Chloroform
addons.description:
"A sweet-smelling organic compound with strong anaesthetic capabilities."

Modifies the Tonic with the following effect:

  • Increases the size and spread of the Gas Clouds by +20 %.

addons.name: Flask of Bleach
addons.description:
"A potent chemical which causes irritation, burns and lung damage."

Modifies the Tonic with the following effect:

  • Increases the strength of the Hindered Status Effect by -2 % to -16 %.

addons.name: Smelly Inner Soles
addons.description:
"A mouldy inner sole which gives much comfort to tired feet."

While replenishing your Bottles, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Increases your Movement speed by +15 %.

addons.name: Spirit of Hartshorn
addons.description:
"A pungent chemical compound consisting of ammonia.
One whiff is enough to jolt even the most sluggish of minds."

Modifies the Antidote with the following effect:

  • Increases the size and spread of Gas Clouds by +20 %.

addons.name: Sulphuric Acid Vial
addons.description:
"A thin and clear combustible liquid which numbs the mind when inhaled."

Survivors afflicted by the Tonic suffer from the following effect:

  • Causes the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Cheap Gin Bottle
addons.description:
"When the night is rough and the day is rougher, a little hair of the dog will give you a boost."

Modifies the Antidote with the following effect:

  • Increases the strength of the Haste Status Effect by +3 % to +17 %.

addons.name: Cigar Box
addons.description:
"A grim and incomplete collection of fingers.
Fills The Clown with longing and focuses his chemical crafting abilities."

Modifies the Antidote with the following effect:

  • The Auras of all Players within 6 metres are revealed to the Invigorated Players for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Ether 15 Vol%
addons.description:
"A highly volatile organic compound, toxic at this concentration."

Modifies the Tonic with the following effect:

  • Increases the duration of Intoxication by +0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Garish Make-Up Kit
addons.description:
"Some for the face and some for the Antidote.
The unknown compound intensifies the Antidote's effect."

Modifies the Antidote with the following effect:

  • Increases the duration of Invigoration by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Redhead's Pinkie Finger
addons.description:
"The prized pinkie finger of a redhead.
Faintly fragrant.
Tastes of potpourri and varnish."

Modifies the Tonic with the following effect:

  • Survivors hit directly with its Bottle suffer from the Exposed Status Effect while Intoxicated.
Redhead's Pinkie Finger limits the number of carried Bottles to 1.

addons.name: Tattoo's Middle Finger
addons.description:
"The prized middle finger of a large tattooed man.
Has a faint taste of machinery oil."

Survivors afflicted by the Tonic or the Antidote suffer from the following effect:

  • Their Auras are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Bear Oil
addons.description:
Melted animal fat that can lubricate the Bear Traps squeaky joints.
  • Setting a Bear Trap is silent.

addons.name: Makeshift Wrap
addons.description:
A scratched and worn brace made of thick, cured animal skin.
  • You are no longer caught in your own Bear Traps, they are automatically disarmed instead.

addons.name: Padded Jaws
addons.description:
"These padded jaws are meant to restrain, not to wound."

Modifies the Bear Traps with the following effect:

  • No longer inflict damage on trapped Survivors.
Padded Jaws grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for triggering the Trapped Score Event.
Padded Jaws negates the effects of the Serrated Jaws and Rusted Jaws Add-ons.

addons.name: Trapper Gloves
addons.description:
Protective padded leather gloves.
  • Increases the Setting speed of the Bear Trap by +30 %.

addons.name: 4-Coil Spring Kit
addons.description:
A replacement kit for Bear Traps which changes the usual dual spring system to four coil springs, adding a great amount of strength to the Bear Traps hold.
  • Increases the Disarm time of the Bear Trap by +33 %.

addons.name: Coffee Grounds
addons.description:
An old rusted can containing damp coffee grounds.
  • Increases the strength of the Haste Status Effect after setting a Bear Trap by +5 % .

addons.name: Lengthened Jaws
addons.description:
Jaws with long teeth that dig further into the flesh than a conventional Bear Traps.
  • Survivors who escape from Bear Traps suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect.

addons.name: Serrated Jaws
addons.description:
These replacement trap jaws have saw-like blades, causing awful open wounds when they snap.
  • Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.

"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

addons.name: Wax Brick
addons.description:
A block of wax used to lower friction and facilitate movement in mechanical parts.
  • Increases the Rescue and Escape times of the Bear Trap by +33 %.

addons.name: Fastening Tools
addons.description:
A specialised set of tools used to fasten Bear Traps to ensure their effectiveness.
  • Increases the Rescue and Escape times from the Bear Trap by +25 %.
  • Increases the Setting speed of the Bear Trap by +50 %.

addons.name: Rusted Jaws
addons.description:
These Bear Trap jaws are covered with crusty and volatile rust spots, making injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Survivors injured by a Bear Trap suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Secondary Coil
addons.description:
A secondary coil keeps the Bear Trap functional in times when the primary coil becomes unusable.
  • Increases the Disarm time of the Bear Trap by +50 %.

addons.name: Tar Bottle
addons.description:
A black, matte and sticky substance that when applied to Bear Traps, makes them far less noticeable.
  • Darkens the Bear Trap.

addons.name: Trapper Bag
addons.description:
A cured leather waist bag.
Large and sturdy to transport hunting equipment.
  • Increases the number of carried Bear Traps by +1.

addons.name: Honing Stone
addons.description:
When used with the Bear Trap, the stone sharpens its blades.

The razor-sharp blades inflict deep wounds aimed at bleeding the victim as fast as possible.

  • Survivors caught in a Bear Trap, who free themselves, are inflicted with the Dying State.

addons.name: Oily Coil
addons.description:
A clear oil that makes handling the Bear Trap's spring more hazardous.
  • Resetting a Bear Trap reveals the Aura of the last Survivor to have disarmed it for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Tension Spring
addons.description:
A high tension spring that snaps back into place after being stretched.
  • Automatically resets the Bear Trap 2 seconds after a Survivor escaped from it.

addons.name: Trapper Sack
addons.description:
A crude leather sack suitable for foraging.
  • Causes all Bear Traps to be carried in your inventory at the beginning of the Trial.
  • You can no longer pick up any placed Bear Traps, only reset them.

addons.name: Bloody Coil
addons.description:
Part sticky, part slippery, this grim liquid makes handling the Bear Traps spring more dangerous.
  • When a healthy Survivor disarms a Bear Trap, the Bloody Coil exacts its price, putting the Survivor into the Injured State.

addons.name: Iridescent Stone
addons.description:
Bear Traps sharpened with the sickly gleaming stone seem to gain a life of their own.
  • Automatically resets and arms a random disarmed Bear Trap every 30 seconds.

addons.name: Choclo Corn
addons.description:
A type of corn common in South America.
A few kernels are reason enough for a crow to stop for a snack.
  • Increases the Timer before idle Dire Crows disintegrate by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Oil Paints
addons.description:
There is little left but a few globs of black and grey, yet Carmina could paint an expansive landscape with them.
  • Increases the Detection radius of Killer Instinct by +1.5 metres.

addons.name: Thick Tar
addons.description:
Sticky, viscous sludge that Carmina used for an experimental piece.
Once it sticks to skin, it is nearly impossible to get off.
  • Increases the Repel duration for Swarmed Survivors by +0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Vibrant Obituary
addons.description:
Scrap newspaper, speckled with bright, eye-catching paint.
It seems tragedy is a daily thing.
  • Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Automatic Drawing
addons.description:
An experimental drawing Carmina made without conscious planning.
Do not think — act.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment by -1.5 seconds after idle Dire Crows disintegrate.

addons.name: Festering Carrion
addons.description:
A stomach-churning pile of meat and guts, yet it attracts hungry crows craving a bite.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment by -0.5 seconds after launching Dire Crows.

addons.name: Still Life Crow
addons.description:
An ink drawing of a dead crow.
Carmina's sadness over its death can be felt with each dark line.
  • Increases the Timer before idle Dire Crows disintegrate by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Untitled Agony
addons.description:
A canvas that was targeted with swipes and trashes of black paint following Matias' death.
It radiates with heavy, crippling sorrow.
  • Swarmed Survivors suffer from a -15 % Hindered Status Effect for 1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Velvet Fabric
addons.description:
A striking red fabric Carmina used on an art project.
Its brightness contrasted against black feathers.
  • The Auras of Swarms continue to be revealed to you for another 1.5 seconds after Survivors start repelling them.

addons.name: Charcoal Stick
addons.description:
A stick of charcoal that conceals anything it rubs over.
  • The Auras Dire Crows mid-flight are no longer visible to Survivors.
  • The Auras of Dire Crows are visible to Survivors for 0.5 seconds after summoning them.

addons.name: Darkest Ink
addons.description:
An unnatural ink, so wretched and dark that it seems to pull in light around it.
  • Swarmed Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
    • This effect lingers for 15 seconds after repelling the Swarm.

addons.name: O Grief, O Lover
addons.description:
An abstract ink drawing that Carmina drew before walking to the Death Leap.
  • Swarmed Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

addons.name: Silver Bell
addons.description:
A shiny trinket that a crow took a liking to.
The clinking of the bell was a distraction to everyone but Carmina.
  • Swarmed Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

addons.name: Thorny Nest
addons.description:
A nest that remained empty near Carmina's home.
There are sharp thorns embedded in it.
  • Survivors suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 70 seconds after being damaged by Dire Crows.

addons.name: Ink Egg
addons.description:
An unusual egg that seems to be nothing but a ball of semi-solid ink.
  • Increases the number of summonable Dire Crows by +1.
  • Reduces the Timer before idle Dire Crows disintegrate by -2 seconds.

"Perhaps, covered in darkness as I was, they saw me as one of their own." — Carmina Mora

addons.name: Matias' Baby Shoes
addons.description:
A grieving reminder to Carmina that Matias would be with her, always watching.
  • The Auras of Survivors within 5 metres of idle Dire Crows are revealed to you for 3 seconds.

"See you soon, Matias." — Carmina Mora

addons.name: Severed Hands
addons.description:
Carmina's severed hands, cut from her arms shortly before her death.
The sight brings sheer fury to her and her protectors.
  • Causes Survivors coming within 3 metres of Swarmed Survivors to become swarmed too.

"How are you going to paint now?" — Hooded Man

addons.name: Severed Tongue
addons.description:
Carmina's tongue, cut from her mouth shortly before her death.
The sight instils rage not just in her, but in her crows.
  • Reduces your Slow-down time by -0.5 seconds after launching Dire Crows.

"How are you going to tell poems now?" — Hooded Man

addons.name: Garden of Rot
addons.description:
A nude self-portrait in which Carmina depicts a rotting darkness growing outwards from within.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 4 seconds after repelling the Swarm.

"I see no salvation in the rot." — Carmina Mora

addons.name: Iridescent Feather
addons.description:
A glass-like feather moulded from The Fog itself.
Simple as it may be, it is a symbol of those who watch over Carmina.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect when Birds of Torment is on Cool-down and you hold no Dire Crows.
  • Reduces the number of summonable Dire Crows by -1.

"They saved me when I could not save myself." — Carmina Mora

addons.name: Bog Water
addons.description:
Murky water contained in a glass pill bottle from another time.
  • Reduces the Trigger range of Phantasm Traps by -10 %.

addons.name: Dead Fly Mud
addons.description:
A small lump of mud, black with the remains of flies.
Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases the Teleport range to tripped Phantasm Traps by +10 %.

addons.name: Powdered Eggshell
addons.description:
Minuscule eggshell fragments shimmering with a pale golden hue.
  • Increases the Tripped duration of Phantasm Traps by +20 %.

addons.name: Rope Necklet
addons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants.
  • Increases the Setting speed of Phantasm Traps by +10 %.

addons.name: Bloodied Water
addons.description:
Tainted water contained in a folded water lily leaf.
  • Reduces the Trigger range of Phantasm Traps by -20 %.

addons.name: Cypress Necklet
addons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with crudely attached cypress bark and swamp moss.
  • Increases the Setting speed of Phantasm Traps by +15 %.

addons.name: Dragonfly Wings
addons.description:
A handful of yellowish wings, dry and crisp.
Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases the Teleport range to tripped Phantasm Traps by +12.5 %.

addons.name: Half Eggshell
addons.description:
One half of a perfectly round hollow eggshell.
  • Increases the Tripped duration of Phantasm Traps by +25 %.

addons.name: Pussy Willow Catkins
addons.description:
A handful of small, pristine flower clusters covered in a fine greyish fur.
  • The Auras of Survivors tripping Phantasm Traps are revealed to you for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Bloodied Mud
addons.description:
A handful of mud with veins of deep crimson.

The bloody layers empower the mud.

  • Reduces the Trigger range of Phantasm Traps by -30 %.

addons.name: Cracked Turtle Egg
addons.description:
A pale orange turtle egg, cracked and emptied of its content.
  • Increases the Tripped duration of Phantasm Traps by +30 %.

addons.name: Dried Cicada
addons.description:
A large swamp cicada covered in a fine layer of ash; crispy.
Devoured to increase stamina.
  • Increases the Teleport range to tripped Phantasm Traps by +15 %.

addons.name: Swamp Orchid Necklet
addons.description:
A rigid ornament worn around the neck made from dead plants adorned with withered orchid petals and leaves.
  • Increases the Setting speed of Phantasm Traps by +20 %.

addons.name: Willow Wreath
addons.description:
Three frail willow branches attached to form a triangular wreath.
  • The Auras of Survivors tripping Phantasm Traps are revealed to you for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Disfigured Ear
addons.description:
The cannibal village deaf boy's ear.
Deformed due to several hits to the head.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power:

Triggering a Phantasm Trap inflicts the following effect on Survivors:

  • Causes them to suffer from the Deafened Status Effect for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Grandma's Heart
addons.description:
The cold heart of the cannibal village elder.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.

Whenever Survivors trigger Phantasm Traps, you benefit from the following effects for their tripped duration:

  • Suppresses your Terror Radius.
  • Increases the Fake Terror Radius of the Mud Phantasms by +16 metres.
"Bring me another slice of the girl." — Grandma

addons.name: Rusty Shackles
addons.description:
Shackles once used to hold prisoners and carcasses in the cannibal village cellar.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Suppresses any indication to Survivors that they tripped Phantasm Traps.
  • Suppresses the creation of Mud Phantasms.

addons.name: Scarred Hand
addons.description:
The cut up, severed hand of the cannibal village butcher.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Grants collision with Survivors to both Phantasm Traps and the Mud Phantasms.
  • Grants +300 % bonus Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.
  • Disables your ability to teleport to tripped Phantasm Traps.

Scarred Hand trumps all other Add-ons.

"..." — The Butcher

addons.name: Mint Rag
addons.description:
A small piece of cotton torn from the dress worn by Lisa Sherwood on the day she disappeared.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Press the Active Ability button to teleport to any untripped Phantasm Trap anywhere in the environment.

Mint Rag has a cool-down of 10 seconds.

addons.name: Waterlogged Shoe
addons.description:
A child's shoe, long lost in the bog's waters.
The trapped life essence within unlocks tremendous potential in The Hag's power.
  • Permanently increases the default Movement speed by +7.5 % to 4.73 m/s.
  • Survivors suffer from a -9 % Hindered Status Effect within the Trigger range of Phantasm Traps.
  • Disables your ability to teleport to tripped Phantasm Traps.

addons.name: Chipped Monocle
addons.description:
A monocle Talbot rarely used despite his eyesight weakening in later years.
  • Unlocks the ability to see the Target location of a Slam.

addons.name: Compound Seven
addons.description:
This early sample failed to achieve desired results, but demonstrated surprising effects regardless.
  • Causes you to automatically face the nearest Survivor within 16 metres of your location after a Slam.

addons.name: Foxglove
addons.description:
A poisonous plant that sparked Talbot's interest in chemistry.
It rekindles deeply buried memories.
  • Reduces the duration of Fatigue by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Placebo Tablet
addons.description:
A pill that is utterly ineffective... or is it?
  • Reduces your Movement speed during a Rush by -15 %.
  • Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Rush Score Events.

addons.name: Blighted Rat
addons.description:
A rat that briefly returned to life when injected with Putrid Serum, becoming aggressive and uncontrollable.
  • Increases your Movement speed during a Rush by a stack-able +2 % for each consecutive Lethal Rush.

addons.name: Canker Thorn
addons.description:
A sizeable thorn snipped from a Visceral Canker.
It secretes a mild toxin.
  • Reduces the duration of Fatigue by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Plague Bile
addons.description:
A sample of bile from The Plague distilled and treated with a mixture of chemicals.
  • Increases the Turn rate during a Rush by +10 %.

addons.name: Pustula Dust
addons.description:
Dried Pustula Petals ground into a fine dust.
  • Increases the duration of the Chain Rush Window by +0.75 seconds.

addons.name: Shredded Notes
addons.description:
The remnants of Talbot's notes, they still contain some valuable information within.
  • Reduces the Recharge time per Power Token by -0.33 seconds.

addons.name: Adrenaline Vial
addons.description:
A hormone removed from an unwilling subject's adrenal gland.
Though it provides a jolt of energy, it can fatigue its user.
  • Increases the number of available Power Tokens by +2.
  • Increases your Movement speed during a Rush by +5 %.
  • Increases your maximum Look angle during a Rush by +20 °.
  • Reduces your Turn rate during a Rush by -0.5 °/s.

"Please, don't do this..."

addons.name: Blighted Crow
addons.description:
A dead crow that has been grotesquely mutated by Putrid Serum.
  • Increases your Movement speed during a Rush by a stack-able +3 % for each consecutive Lethal Rush.

addons.name: Compound Twenty-One
addons.description:
A serum that's fatal to humans.
It evokes beneficial qualities in those who are... something more.
  • The Auras of Survivors within 8 metres of a Slam are revealed to you for 3.5 seconds.

addons.name: Rose Tonic
addons.description:
A mixture made with dried roses from the exceedingly rare New Moon Bouquet.
  • Increases the duration of the Chain Rush Window by +1 second.

addons.name: Umbra Salts
addons.description:
Regular sea salt that has momentarily passed through the Spirit World, altering its properties in the process.
  • Increases the Turn rate during a Rush by +15 %.

addons.name: Alchemist's Ring
addons.description:
A ring given to chemists graduating from the London School of Medicine.
It is a reminder of unrestrained ambition.
  • Extends the Rush duration by +20 % for each consecutive Lethal Rush.

"The student is accused of grave-robbing with the intent of unsanctioned scientific testing." — Faculty Reprimand of Talbot Grimes, 1838

addons.name: Soul Chemical
addons.description:
A chemical squeezed from the pineal gland of a recently deceased Survivor.
  • Increases the initial Movement speed of a Rush by +5 %.

"...suspected to cause atypical alterations in neural rhythmic activity." — Unlabelled Mystery School Text

addons.name: Summoning Stone
addons.description:
Talbot used this stone to carve what he believed was his research into the Opium Den's walls.
  • Increases the initial duration of a Rush by +0.5 seconds.

"Death is only the beginning."

addons.name: Vigo's Journal
addons.description:
The journal of a man who claimed to have returned from The Void.
The knowledge within has practical applications.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect during a Rush.

"In a wasteland of forgotten dreams and endless routine, the man with a way out is God." — Talbot Grimes

addons.name: Compound Thirty-Three
addons.description:
Talbot's penultimate attempt at a serum.
Though it did not facilitate his escape, it did have powerful side effects.
  • Blighted Corruption is capped at 5 Tokens.
  • Increases your Turn rate during a Rush by +11 %.
  • Increases the duration of a Rush by +11 %.

"Time is scarce. Let this be the one..." — Talbot Grimes

addons.name: Iridescent Blight Tag
addons.description:
A glass-like laboratory tag, moulded from The Fog itself.
Either a gift from The Entity or a cruel jest to tag The Blight as he once did to others.
  • Blighted Corruption is capped at 3 Tokens.
  • Increases your Movement speed during a Rush by +10 %.
  • Increases your maximum Look angle during a Rush by +20 °.

"Progress requires drastic change." — Talbot Grimes

addons.name: Cat Figurine
addons.description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye.
He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.
  • Unlocks the ability to see the Target location of a Pounce.

addons.name: Soured Milk
addons.description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured.
Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.
  • Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +2 metres.

addons.name: Tiny Fingernail
addons.description:
Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor's death.
As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.
  • Reduces the Unbinding time of Victor by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Toy Sword
addons.description:
A minuscule toy sword, only a few inches long.
Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.
  • Reduces the Charge time of a Pounce by -0.1 second.

addons.name: Baby Teeth
addons.description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago.
They are unusually sharp.
  • Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds after removing Victor.

addons.name: Bloody Black Hood
addons.description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte.
Soon, he became the prey.
  • Reduces the Transition time when switching back to Charlotte by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Cat's Eye
addons.description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes family.
Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.
  • Suppresses all noise made by Victor while holding a Pounce.

addons.name: Ceremonial Candelabrum
addons.description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn.
A symbol of his tenacity.
  • Increases the Crushing time of Victor by +0.2 seconds when controlling Charlotte.

addons.name: Madeleine's Glove
addons.description:
A glove once owned by The Twins' mother.
During desperate times, it was held over Victor's mouth to keep him from making a peep.
  • Increases the Shriek radius of Victor by +4 metres.

addons.name: Madeleine's Scarf
addons.description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death.
The Twins kept it as a memento.
  • Increases your Movement speed when controlling Victor by +0.3 m/s.

"...shall hereby be recorded as a service to the greater good and the extermination of evil." — Inquiry into the Death of Madeleine Deshayes

addons.name: Rusted Needle
addons.description:
A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children's tattered clothes.
  • Removing a latched-on Victor causes the Survivor to suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.

addons.name: Sewer Sludge
addons.description:
A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.
  • Increases the time required to remove a latched-on Victor by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Stale Biscuit
addons.description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town's market.
It was not much, but it was better than most meals.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of a Pounce by -0.4 seconds.

addons.name: Weighty Rattle
addons.description:
A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him.
It is entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
  • Removing a latched-on Victor causes the Survivor to suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 20 seconds.

addons.name: Drop of Perfume
addons.description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with.
It has a pleasant, disarming scent.
  • Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect within Victor's Shriek range when controlling Charlotte.

"Beware the deceit of witches, for they exploit the goodness in men's hearts." — A History of Witches and Demons, 1602

addons.name: Forest Stew
addons.description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
  • Increases your Movement speed when controlling Victor by +0.6 m/s.

"Eat... eat, child. You'll feel better when it's down." — Madeleine Deshayes

addons.name: Spinning Top
addons.description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own.
He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
  • Causes Survivors hit with a Pounce to drop any carried Item.

"Hush... hush... it is yours then." — Charlotte Deshayes

addons.name: Victor's Soldier
addons.description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared.
Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
  • The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds after crushing Victor when controlling Charlotte.

"Kch--kch—k'ull bawd mennn..." — Victor Deshayes

addons.name: Iridescent Pendant
addons.description:
A glass-like pendant moulded from The Fog itself.
There is a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.
  • Crushing Victor while Charlotte is in control causes the Survivor to suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 45 seconds.

"Your binding is no curse, my loves. It is your strength to draw upon." — Madeleine Deshayes

addons.name: Silencing Cloth
addons.description:
A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth.
Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.
  • After waking from her Dormant State, Charlotte is granted the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.

"I don't like this game anymore, Mother..." — Charlotte Deshayes

addons.name: Chainsaw File
addons.description:
A file whose purpose is to hone Chainsaw chains.
  • Reduces the duration of a Tantrum by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Spark Plug
addons.description:
A clean spark plug fitted for a Chainsaw.
  • Reduces the Power Recharge time by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Speed Limiter
addons.description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.
  • Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
  • Survivors hit with Bubba's Chainsaw are only damaged for a single Health State.

addons.name: Vegetable Oil
addons.description:
A rancid oil used as a poor quality lubricant.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Bubba's Chainsaw by -0.3 seconds.

addons.name: Chilli
addons.description:
A big bowl of steaming Chilli to keep you fresh and strong.
  • Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash by +0.15 seconds per consumed Token.
  • Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash Window by +0.15 seconds.

"I got some good barbecue here!" — Drayton Sawyer

addons.name: Homemade Muffler
addons.description:
A makeshift exhaust system made of black gas pipes.
  • Reduces the duration of a Tantrum by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Knife Scratches
addons.description:
Scratches cover the Chainsaw's body, caused by a searing blade.
Memories of reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
  • Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by +1.5 %.
  • Increases the Power Charge time by +10 %.

addons.name: Long Guide Bar
addons.description:
A sturdy iron replacement bar for long chains.
  • Increases the threshold before Revving triggers a Tantrum by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Primer Bulb
addons.description:
Pumps more gas in the ignition system to ensure a quick and powerful start.
  • Reduces the Power Recharge time by -1 second.

addons.name: Begrimed Chains
addons.description:
This chain is stained with a foul substance that debilitates anyone it touches.
  • Causes Survivors hit by Bubba's Chainsaw to drop any carried Item.

addons.name: Grisly Chains
addons.description:
A chain with unusually hefty cutter teeth that leaves victims crippled even after being healed.
  • Survivors hit by Bubba's Chainsaw suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Shop Lubricant
addons.description:
An oil specifically formulated for Chainsaws.
A special additive prevents oil throw off.
  • The Auras of Survivors downed by Bubba's Chainsaw, if no other Survivors were within the Terror Radius, are hidden to other Survivors for 20 seconds.

addons.name: The Beast's Marks
addons.description:
Jagged marks cover the Chainsaw's body, punishment from the dark beast that lives in The Fog.
Memories of violent reprimands fill its holder with the fear of failure.
  • Increases the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by +2 %.
  • Increases the Power Charge time by +12 %.

addons.name: The Grease
addons.description:
A thick yellowish ooze, concocted by the Sawyers.
Used for all-purpose lubrication around their house.
  • Increases the threshold before Revving triggers a Tantrum by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Award-winning Chilli
addons.description:
A big bowl of spicy Chilli made famous thanks to prime meat.
  • Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash by +0.2 seconds per consumed Token.
  • Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash Window by +0.2 seconds.

"The secret's in the meat" — Drayton Sawyer

addons.name: Depth Gauge Rake
addons.description:
A tool that increases the angle of the depth gauge, making the chain eat more "wood".
  • Increases the Power Tokens by +1.
  • Reduces the Power Charge speed by -18 %.
  • Reduces the Movement speed during a Chainsaw Dash by -2 %.

addons.name: Light Chassis
addons.description:
A light and durable Chainsaw chassis with a shorter guide bar.
Makes the Chainsaw easier to handle.
  • The Auras of Survivors within 8 metres are revealed to you while revving Bubba's Chainsaw.

addons.name: Rusted Chains
addons.description:
This chain is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal.
  • Survivors hit by Bubba's Chainsaw suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 90 seconds.

addons.name: Carburettor Tuning Guide
addons.description:
A crudely drawn guide to properly adjust and tune a Chainsaw carburettor.

Starting a Chainsaw Dash automatically consumes all available Power Tokens, combining their durations:

  • Increases the duration of the Chainsaw Dash by +0.5 seconds per Token.
  • Reduces the Movement speed during the Chainsaw Dash by -2 %.

addons.name: Iridescent Flesh
addons.description:
A thin slice of smooth, young flesh.
The veins shimmer with luminescent glow, as if life still flows within.
  • Instantly recharges all Power Tokens after hitting a Survivor with Bubba's Chainsaw.
  • Reduces the maximum duration of a Tantrum to 3 seconds.

"There are moments when we cannot believe that what is happening is really true.
Pinch yourself and you may find out that it is." — Pam Jones

addons.name: "Calm" - Class I
addons.description:
An ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause mild anxiety in the patient.
  • Increases your Terror Radius by +4 metres while Static Blast is ready to be used.
  • Reduces your Terror Radius by -4 metres while Static Blast is on cool-down.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

  • Madness II: Survivors intermittently hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III: Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.

addons.name: "Order" - Class I
addons.description:
A conventional ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute.
Can cause a state of mild confusion in the patient.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Static Blast by -2 seconds.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

  • Broken Pallets are randomly replaced by dropped or upright Illusionary Pallets, which persist until approached by Survivors.
    • New Illusionary Pallets are generated every 20 seconds.

You share into your patients' Madness and can see the Illusionary Pallets.

addons.name: Maple Knight
addons.description:
A white knight chess piece made of maple.
This gift from an old man brings back distant memories and imbues The Doctor with devastating focus.
  • Grants the ability to see the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack.

addons.name: Mouldy Electrode
addons.description:
A mouldy electrode which can nevertheless conduct a weak electrical current.
  • Extends the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack by +2 metres.

addons.name: "Calm" - Class II
addons.description:
A risky ECT procedure using a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure can cause moderate anxiety in the patient.
  • Increases your Terror Radius by +6 metres while Static Blast is ready to be used.
  • Reduces your Terror Radius by -6 metres while Static Blast is on cool-down.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

  • Madness II: Survivors intermittently hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III: Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.

addons.name: "Discipline" - Class II
addons.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at high voltage.
Can cause a state of moderate paranoia in the patient.
  • Reduces the Detonation delay of the Shock Therapy Attack by -0.1 seconds.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

  • Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius, as if you were constantly right behind them.
    • This effect lingers for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
  • Madness III: In any situation, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius, as if you were constantly right behind them.

You share into your patients' Madness and can see the Illusionary Red Stain.

"We re-educate our patients with the greatest care." — Léry's Memorial Institute

addons.name: "Order" - Class II
addons.description:
A high stimulus ECT procedure, part of a patient's daily routine at the Léry's Memorial Institute.
Can cause a state of moderate confusion in the patient.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Static Blast by -2.5 seconds.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

  • Broken Pallets are randomly replaced by dropped or upright Illusionary Pallets, which persist until approached by Survivors.
    • New Illusionary Pallets are generated every 20 seconds.

You share into your patients' Madness and can see the Illusionary Pallets.

"Side effects are very rare." — Léry's Memorial Institute

addons.name: "Restraint" - Class II
addons.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog.
Uses a wavelength that links the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause mild cases of hallucination in the patient.
  • The Auras of Survivors who have their Madness increased by one Tier are revealed to you for 1 second.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

  • Increases the duration of Illusionary Doctors by +6 seconds.

You share into your patients' Madness and can see the Illusionary Doctors.

addons.name: Polished Electrode
addons.description:
A like-new standard electrode equipment to conduct electro-convulsive treatments.
  • Extends the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack by +3 metres.

addons.name: "Discipline" - Class III
addons.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action which uses a fixed dose at very high voltage.
Can cause a state of serious paranoia in the patient.
  • Reduces the Detonation delay of the Shock Therapy Attack by -0.15 seconds.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

  • Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius, as if you were constantly right behind them.
    • This effect lingers for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
  • Madness III: In any situation, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius, as if you were constantly right behind them.

You share into your patients' Madness and can see the Illusionary Red Stain.

"Respect of our patients is at the core of our principles." — Léry's Memorial Institute

addons.name: "Restraint" - Class III
addons.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog.
Uses a high stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause serious cases of hallucinations in the patient.
  • The Auras of Survivors who have their Madness increased by one Tier are revealed to you for 2 seconds.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

  • Increases the duration of Illusionary Doctors by +6 seconds.

You share into your patients' Madness and can see the Illusionary Doctors.

addons.name: High Stimulus Electrode
addons.description:
An experimental electrode that can withstand very high charges for a longer period of time.
  • Extends the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack by +4 metres.

addons.name: Interview Tape
addons.description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing an unedited interview of a victim.
Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
  • Reshapes the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack from a cone into a narrow beam that is 2 metres wide and 24 metres long.

addons.name: Scrapped Tape
addons.description:
A compact cassette from Project Awakening containing mostly white noise.
Opens The Doctor's mind to alternate treatment methods.
  • Reshapes the Area of Effect of the Shock Therapy Attack from a cone into a hollow ring which is placed 8 metres in front of The Doctor.
    • The ring has a radius of 4 metres a thickness of 1 metre.

addons.name: "Calm" - Carter's Notes
addons.description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
Uses a deep wavelength that soothes various mental illnesses.
With Carter's Spark as its source, this procedure causes uncontrollable fear and anxiety in the patient.
  • Increases your Terror Radius by +8 metres while Static Blast is ready to be used.
  • Reduces your Terror Radius by -8 metres while Static Blast is on cool-down.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Calm:

  • Madness II: Survivors intermittently hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
  • Madness III: Survivors constantly hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.

"Higher quality seizures trigger catatonia. At least it gives me peace for the time it lasts." — Herman Carter

addons.name: "Discipline" - Carter's Notes
addons.description:
Project Awakening ECT procedure for disciplinary action, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
The intolerably high voltage leaves the patient in a severe state of paranoia.
  • Reduces the Detonation delay of the Shock Therapy Attack by -0.2 seconds.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Discipline:

  • Madness II: During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius, as if you were constantly right behind them.
