    • This effect lingers for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
  • Madness III: In any situation, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius, as if you were constantly right behind them.

You share into your patients' Madness and can see the Illusionary Red Stain.

"To avoid relapse from our most tenacious subjects, use maximum levels when proceeding with disciplinary actions." — Herman Carter

addons.name: "Order" - Carter's Notes
addons.description:
An experimental version of the ECT procedure, annotated by Doctor Herman Carter himself.
The long, constant stimulus leaves the patient in a state of severe confusion.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Static Blast by -3 seconds.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Order:

  • Broken Pallets are randomly replaced by dropped or upright Illusionary Pallets, which persist until approached by Survivors.
    • New Illusionary Pallets are generated every 20 seconds.

You share into your patients' Madness and can see the Illusionary Pallets.

"The stimulus must be kept active at a convulsive level." — Herman Carter

addons.name: "Restraint" - Carter's Notes
addons.description:
An experimental ECT procedure developed within The Fog, crudely annotated.
Uses an unbearable stimulus wavelength to link the patient's and The Doctor's minds.
This procedure is known to cause severe cases of hallucinations in the patient.
  • The Auras of Survivors who have their Madness increased by one Tier are revealed to you for 3 seconds.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer from the Affliction of Restraint:

  • Increases the duration of Illusionary Doctors by +6 seconds.

You share into your patients' Madness and can see the Illusionary Doctors.

"I CAN SEE THEIR DISGUSTING ILLNESSES." — unsighned Notes, likely Herman Carter

addons.name: Iridescent King
addons.description:
A glass-like king chess piece moulded from The Fog itself.
The Entity's trace reverberating within can break the most powerful minds.

Survivors affected by Madness suffer simultaneously from the Afflictions of Calm, Discipline, Order, and Restraint:

  • Survivors intermittently hear a distant Illusionary Terror Radius.
  • During a Chase, Survivors perceive an Illusionary Red Stain and Terror Radius, as if you were constantly right behind them.
    • Madness II: This effect lingers for 6 seconds after the Chase ends.
    • Madness III: This effect is constant, regardless of whether the Survivors are being chased or not.
  • Broken Pallets are randomly replaced by dropped or upright Illusionary Pallets, which persist until approached by Survivors.
    • New Illusionary Pallets are generated every 20 seconds.
  • Increases the duration of Illusionary Doctors by +6 seconds.
You share into your patients' Madness and can see the Illusionary Doctors, Red Stain, and Pallets.

"Gazing into the iridescent glass is plunging one's self into madness." — Herman Carter

addons.name: Iridescent Queen
addons.description:
A glass-like queen chess piece moulded from The Fog itself.
It cannot be touched without receiving a considerable jolt of electricity.

Survivors struck by either the Shock Therapy Attack or a Static Blast acquire a lingering Static Charge, unless they are within 4 metres of another Survivor:

  • The Static Charge remains with the Survivor until it is discharged.
  • Charged Survivors who come within 4 metres of another Survivor trigger an automatic Shock Therapy Attack, shocking both Survivors and automatically discharging any remaining Static Charges.
"Once we have established an effective method of treatment, we can focus on its efficient means of delivery." — Herman Carter

addons.name: Counterweight
addons.description:
Adds weight to the base, for stability.
  • Reduces the initial Turn rate of the Chainsaw during a Chainsaw Sprint by -70 %.

addons.name: Cracked Primer Bulb
addons.description:
A button that clears air from the fuel lines.
This machine needs to be fed.
  • Increases the Charge rate of the Overdrive Meter by +15 %.
  • Survivors hit with the Chainsaw are only damaged for a single Health State.

addons.name: Discarded Air Filter
addons.description:
A cracked and dusty filter.
It still manages to work better than the stock model.
  • Increases the Decay delay for the Overdrive Meter by +20 %.

addons.name: Steel Toe Boots
addons.description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -10 %.

addons.name: Clogged Intake
addons.description:
Modifying the airflow is key to modifying the Chainsaw's power.
  • Extends the duration of Overdrive by +15 %.

addons.name: Greased Throttle
addons.description:
A lubricated trigger.
One twitch of the finger brings the Chainsaw back to life.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after using the Chainsaw by -5 %, when not in Overdrive.

addons.name: High-Speed Idler Screw
addons.description:
A loosened screw will bring more power to the Chainsaw
  • Increases the Decay delay for the Overdrive Meter by +30 %.

addons.name: Off-Brand Motor Oil
addons.description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.
  • Increases the Charge rate of the Overdrive Meter by +15 %.

addons.name: Thermal Casing
addons.description:
A thicker case that allows the user to control the conservation of energy.
  • Reduces the Dissipation speed of the Overdrive Meter when not using the Chainsaw by -20 %.

addons.name: Begrimed Chains
addons.description:
A foul yet oddly familiar chain, coated with something unpleasant.
  • Survivors hit with the Chainsaw suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Dad's Boots
addons.description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Senior.
  • Increases the Turn speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +20 %.

addons.name: Low Kickback Chains
addons.description:
A specialised chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after hitting an obstacle during a Chainsaw Sprint by -15 %.

addons.name: Ragged Engine
addons.description:
Some would say it needs a tune-up.
Max would say it is tuned-up.
  • Reduces the Dissipation speed of the Overdrive Meter when not using the Chainsaw by -30 %.

addons.name: The Thompsons' Mix
addons.description:
A special oily substance used in the lubrication of all machinery concocted by the Thompsons themselves.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after using the Chainsaw by -10 %, when not in Overdrive.

addons.name: Apex Muffler
addons.description:
A masterfully crafted chainsaw muffler that outperforms all others.
  • Silences the Chainsaw for all Survivors outside of the Terror Radius.

addons.name: Filthy Slippers
addons.description:
Max sometimes struggled to hear his mother's footfalls.
  • Gain the Undetectable Status Effect until you stop sprinting after maintaining a Chainsaw Sprint for at least 2 seconds.

addons.name: LoPro Chains
addons.description:
Light chains that decrease the weight of the Chainsaw, allowing for greater manoeuvrability.
  • Grants the ability to continue a Chainsaw Sprint through Breakable Walls and dropped Pallets, breaking them in the process.
  • Healthy Survivors hit with the Chainsaw within 5 seconds of triggering the primary effect are only damaged for a single Health State.
    • Injured Survivors will suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect instead.

addons.name: Spiked Boots
addons.description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow into mud for more stability and control with each step.
  • Increases the Turn speed during the Chainsaw Sprint by +30 %.

addons.name: Iridescent Engravings
addons.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in The Fog.
Fills the user with determination.
  • Increases your Movement speed during a Chainsaw Sprint by +20 %.
  • Increases the Charge time of the Chainsaw by +12 %.

addons.name: Tuned Carburettor
addons.description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburettor has been well adjusted.
  • Increases the Charge speed of the Chainsaw by +20 %.
  • Permanently reduces the default Movement speed to 4.4 m/s.

addons.name: Cabin Sign
addons.description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape.
Carries the memory of those first curses.
  • Reduces the time it takes for TVs to turn back on after Projection by -4.5 seconds.

addons.name: Mother's Mirror
addons.description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house.
A reminder of what Sadako has lost.
  • Increases the duration of your intermittent Invisibility after Manifesting by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Old Newspaper
addons.description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.
  • Increases the duration of your full Invisibility after Manifesting by +33 %.

addons.name: Videotape Copy
addons.description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako.
It dampens the desire for vengeance.
  • Extends the radius around TVs within which Survivors gain Condemned from Projection by +2 metres.

addons.name: Clump of Hair
addons.description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.
  • Reduces the threshold for full Invisibility while Demanifested by -6 metres.

addons.name: Reiko's Watch
addons.description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi.
A distracting and constant reminder of one's impending doom.
  • Increases the duration of your full Invisibility while Demanifested by +25 %.

addons.name: Sea-Soaked Cloth
addons.description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape.
Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.
  • Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect when within 8 metres of powered TVs.
    • This effect lingers for 7 seconds after turning off a TV.

addons.name: Well Stone
addons.description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.
  • Reduces the time it takes for TVs to turn back on after Projection by -7 seconds.

addons.name: Yoichi's Fishing Net
addons.description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather.
A reminder that death comes to us all.
  • Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect after acquiring at least 4 Stacks of Condemned.

addons.name: Bloody Fingernails
addons.description:
Sadako's bloody fingernails, lost as she tried to claw her way out of the well.
Evidence of her single-minded need to kill.
  • Increases the Speed Boost duration after Projection by +50 %.

addons.name: Mother's Comb
addons.description:
The comb Sadako's mother used in the tape.
Sadako's psychic abilities are enhanced when she focuses on it.
  • Highlights the Auras of all turned-off TVs in yellow.
  • Causes TVs being turned off to trigger a Loud Noise Notification.

addons.name: Rickety Pinwheel
addons.description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima.
It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.
  • Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect when within 8 metres of powered TVs.
    • This effect lingers for 7 seconds after turning off a TV.

addons.name: Ring Drawing
addons.description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi.
Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.
  • Hooking a Survivor carrying a VHS Tape causes all other Survivors to gain +1 Stack of Condemned.

addons.name: Well Water
addons.description:
Water from the well where Sadako was left to die.
Murky and black, it obscures everything around it.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +2 seconds after Manifesting by any means.

addons.name: Distorted Photo
addons.description:
Those who have watched the tape find all photos of themselves distorted, a reminder of their impending doom.
  • Causes all Survivors within 16 metres of your location who witness your Manifestation to scream and reveal their Auras for 4 seconds.

"Why is it only you were saved?" — Sadaoka Yamamura

addons.name: Tape Editing Deck
addons.description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyse and copy the tape.
Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.
  • Causes all Survivors start the Trial with a VHS Tape.
    • All Survivors must bring their VHS Tape to the TV that is farthest from their current location.
  • The Auras of Survivors inserting a VHS Tape into a TV are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

"Frolic in brine, goblins be thine." — Message hidden in Sakado's Tape

addons.name: Telephone
addons.description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call.
They are frozen in fear as they realise they have seven days left to live.
  • Survivors suffer from a -3 % Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds when Manifesting within 7 metres of them.

"I saw a weird video the other day... after it ended, someone called us. Some kind of prank call." — Tomoko Oishi

addons.name: VCR
addons.description:
The original VCR that played Sadako's Tape.
It is still warm to the touch.
  • Causes all TVs to play the Projection Effects when using Projection.

addons.name: Iridescent Videotape
addons.description:
The original tape containing Sadako's curse.
  • Projection no longer turns off TVs, but also no longer applies any Condemned.
  • Increases the time required for TVs to turn back on after having been turned off by Survivors by +20 %.

"That video... It's not of this world. It's Sadako's rage." — Ryuji Takayama

addons.name: Remote Control
addons.description:
A remote for the VCR at the cabin.
It allows Sadako to focus on those enemies at a distance.
  • The Auras of all Survivors within 12 metres of powered TVs are revealed to you for 7 seconds after using Projection.

"She killed a man just by willing him dead. That's power of a different order from her mother." — Ryuji Takayama

addons.name: Garden Rake
addons.description:
A small claw rake, a must have tool for any accomplished gardener.
  • Increases the size of the Dream Snare by +10 %.

addons.name: Kid's Drawing
addons.description:
An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.
  • Increases the amount of Microsleep gained from the Dream Abilities by +10 %.

addons.name: Sheep Block
addons.description:
A white and blue wooden block depicting two woolly Lambs grazing and the letter "S".
  • Increases the Cool-down time of Alarm Clocks by +10 %.

addons.name: Wool Shirt
addons.description:
A small boy's orange and yellow striped shirt. Identified with a sewn name tag to "Jesse".
  • Reduces the Detonation delay of rupturing Dream Pallets by -10 %.

addons.name: Cat Block
addons.description:
A white and purple wooden block depicting a sleeping Cat and the letter "C".
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of the Dream Projection ability by -10 %.

addons.name: Green Dress
addons.description:
A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.
  • Increases the time required to perform the Wake Up action by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Nancy's Sketch
addons.description:
A crude and bold sketch made with Fusain, signed by Nancy H.
  • Reduces the duration of Sleep Immunity by -20 %.

addons.name: Outdoor Rope
addons.description:
Sturdy outdoor rope, handy to tie up anything.
  • Increases the Travel speed of Dream Snares while placing them by +15 %.

addons.name: Prototype Claws
addons.description:
A home-made tool to facilitate bush trimming.
  • Reduces the Charge time of Dream Snares by -10 %.

addons.name: Blue Dress
addons.description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which's front is ruined by large cuts.
  • Reduces the number of placeable Dream Snares to 1.
  • Causes the Dream Snare to be stationary while placing.
  • Causes the Dream Snare to automatically disappear after 8 seconds.

addons.name: Jump Rope
addons.description:
A long Double-Dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.
  • Increases the duration of the -12 % Hindered Status Effect caused by Dream Snares by +0.5 seconds to 5 seconds.

addons.name: Nancy's Masterpiece
addons.description:
A painting of a character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasured memory.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Dream Projection by -10 % whenever a Survivor is affected by a Dream Ability.

addons.name: Paint Thinner
addons.description:
A tin of a highly volatile and inflammable material.
  • Causes Survivors dropping a Dream Pallet to trigger Killer Instinct for 6 seconds.
  • Grants the ability to target these Survivors with the Dream Projection ability:
    • Increases the Charge speed of this Dream Projection by +100 %.

addons.name: Unicorn Block
addons.description:
A white and red wooden block depicting a prancing Unicorn and the letter "U".
  • Increases the Detonation radius of rupturing Dream Pallets by +0.5 metres.

addons.name: "Z" Block
addons.description:
A deeply scratched and burnt wooden block which's only recognisable feature is the letter "Z".
  • The Auras of Survivors affected by a Dream Snare or a Dream Pallet are revealed for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Class Photo
addons.description:
A large photograph taken at Badham Preschool showing the cheerful class of '94-95.
  • Grants the ability target the Exit Gate Switches with the Dream Projection ability.
  • Causes Survivors opening an Exit Gate to trigger Killer Instinct.

addons.name: Pill Bottle
addons.description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called Zoneral.
  • Reduces the duration of the next instance of Microsleep for Survivors having entered the Dream World by falling asleep by a stack-able -10 %, up to a maximum of -50 %.

addons.name: Swing Chains
addons.description:
Rusty, but sturdy chains used to securely attach a swing seat.
  • Blocks all Windows within 16 metres of your location for 6 seconds after using the Dream Projection ability.

addons.name: Black Box
addons.description:
A black cardboard box filled with photographs.
  • Causes the Exit Gates to be blocked for Asleep Survivors for 15 seconds after they are opened.
    • This effect lingers for 3 seconds after those Survivors wake up.

addons.name: Red Paint Brush
addons.description:
A large paint brush, wet with crimson paint.
  • The Auras of Survivors trapped in the Dream World are revealed to you, whenever they are farther than 32 metres from your location.
  • Increases the default duration of Microsleep by +50 %.

addons.name: Blond Hair
addons.description:
"A single slightly wavy blond hair."

While in Stalker Mode, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Increases the duration of Scratch Marks and Pools of Blood by +100 %.

addons.name: Boyfriend's Memo
addons.description:
"A "romantic", if slightly sleazy, note left around to draw the attention of a female lover."

Modifies the Stalk ability with the following effect:

  • Increases the range of Stalking by +8 metres.
"The note is signed: D."

addons.name: Memorial Flower
addons.description:
"A partially faded and dried pink larkspur picked up from a gravestone."

Modifies Stalker Mode with the following effect:

  • Increases your Movement speed by +0.2 m/s to 4.4 m/s.

addons.name: Tacky Earrings
addons.description:
"A very cheap piece of jewellery made from plastic. Painted to resemble precious material."

Modifies Evil Within with the following effect:

  • Increases your Movement speed while Stalking by +20 %.

addons.name: Dead Rabbit
addons.description:
"A grey rabbit which has been opened from neck to tail."

Adjusts the Terror Radius, depending on the current Mode of Evil Within:

  • Pursuer Mode: Reduces it by -25 %.
  • Evil Incarnate: Increases it by +25 %.

addons.name: Fragrant Tuft of Hair
addons.description:
"A tuft of blond hair which was forcefully torn off someone's scalp.
Releases hints of feminine floral fragrance."

During Evil Incarnate, the following effects apply:

  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect.
  • Increases the Lunge Range by +50 %.
  • Disables the Slaughtering Strike ability.

addons.name: Glass Fragment
addons.description:
"A tiny piece of tinted glass, probably from a broken object.
It is impossible to determine its origin."

Modifies Slaughtering Strike with the following effects:

  • Increases the Movement speed of Slaughtering Strike by +5 %.
  • Decreases the Charge speed of Slaughtering Strike by -10 %.

addons.name: Hair Brush
addons.description:
"A nylon bristle brush used to add body and softness to hair."

When Evil Incarnate activates, Hair Brush triggers its effect:

  • Increases the Action speed of the next Pallet break action by +50 %.

addons.name: Jewellery
addons.description:
"A large necklace made of beads an inexpensive metals.
One of Judith's favourites."

When Stalking stationary Survivors, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Increases the Power speed of Stalking by +10 %.

addons.name: Hair Bow
addons.description:
"A blue tartan ribbon used to tie hair."

Modifies Evil Incarnate with the following effects:

  • Increases the duration of Evil Incarnate by +20 seconds.
  • Reduces the Power speed of Stalking by -20 %.

addons.name: J. Myers Memorial
addons.description:
"A glossy page ripped from the 1965 Haddonfield High School yearbook, one dedicated to the memory of Judith Myers."

While in Evil Incarnate, the following effect applies:

  • Increases the speed of Picking up and Hooking Survivors by +40 %.

addons.name: Jewellery Box
addons.description:
"A barren wooden box in which vanity items were once stored."

Modifies the Stalk ability with the following effect:

  • Increases the Power speed of Stalking by +30 %.
  • Decreases the range of Stalking by -16 metres.

addons.name: Judith's Journal
addons.description:
"A journal identified as owned by Judith M. Myers.
Most of the pages are defaced with frightening and disturbing drawings."

While Stalking the Obsession, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Increases the Power speed of Stalking by +40 %.

addons.name: Mirror Shard
addons.description:
"A large and sharp piece of a broken mirror."

Modifies Slaughtering Strike with the following effects:

  • Increases the base duration of Slaughtering Strike by +0.25 seconds.
  • Decreases the charge speed of Slaughtering Strike by -25 %.

addons.name: Lock of Hair
addons.description:
"A cut lock of blond hair bunched with a black elastic."

Unlocks the following ability while in Evil Incarnate:

  • Hold the Active Ability button to end Evil Incarnate prematurely.
    • This converts 50 % of the remaining duration into Stalk progress.

addons.name: Reflective Fragment
addons.description:
"A tiny piece of a highly reflective material most probably from a broken mirror."

Modifies Slaughtering Strike with the following effects:

  • Survivors hit by Slaughtering Strike are only damaged for a single Health State.
  • Successful hits with Slaughtering Strike instantly add +20 seconds to the duration of Evil Incarnate.

addons.name: Tombstone Piece
addons.description:
"A fist-sized granite piece taken from a broken tombstone."

Activating Evil Incarnate triggers the following effect:

  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.

addons.name: Vanity Mirror
addons.description:
"A standing portable vanity mirror in perfect condition except for a fine layer of dust and face powder covering it."

Modifies Evil Incarnate with the following effect:

  • When Evil Incarnate ends, the Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for 4 seconds.

addons.name: Judith's Tombstone
addons.description:
"A large and heavy granite tombstone stolen from Mt. Sinclair cemetery, belonging to Judith Myers."

Modifies Evil Incarnate with the following effects:

  • Hooking a Survivor while in Evil Incarnate will refresh its duration.
  • Caps the maximum duration of Evil Incarnate at 40 seconds.
"Here lies our beloved daughter."

addons.name: Scratched Mirror
addons.description:
"A standing portable vanity mirror which has been violently scratched with a sharp metallic object."

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability while Stalking:

  • The Auras of all Survivors within 32 metres of your location are revealed to you.
Hitting Survivors with your Basic Attack grants the following bonus Bloodpoints:
  • Brutality Scoring Category: +100 %
  • Deviousness Scoring Category: +200 %
Evil Within loses the ability to exit Stalker Mode.

addons.name: Adi Valente Issue 1
addons.description:
An original copy of the first issue of Adi Valente, the comic her father made while Adriana was a child.
  • Reduces the Success Zone of Skill Checks for Claw-Trapped Survivors by -20 %.

addons.name: High-Current Upgrade
addons.description:
A wider cable with low resistance that allows faster recharging of batteries.
  • Increases the Tracking duration of the Radar by +1 second.

addons.name: High-Power Floodlight
addons.description:
A sudden and overwhelming light that discombobulates anyone foolish enough to approach.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.

addons.name: Ultrasonic Speaker
addons.description:
A high-frequency noise blaster that fills the sonic spectrum with disorienting sounds, making it impossible for observers to pick out more important noises.
  • Reduces the duration of the immunity to consecutive Scan-Line Hits for Survivors to 90 % of its default value.

addons.name: Adaptive Lighting
addons.description:
The Drone takes account of the surrounding area and casts lights in a bewildering manner that obscures movement.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +20 % to 9.6 seconds.

addons.name: Low-Power Mode
addons.description:
By intermittently powering on and off non-vital components, the Drone can stay on for longer.
  • Reduces the Rotational speed of the Scan Lines of Drones by -100 %.

addons.name: Shotgun Speakers
addons.description:
Capable of directing high-frequency noises in a single direction over great distances, the Drones can focus in on one individual and distract them from danger for some time.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors no longer receive a warning sound of impending Skill Checks.

addons.name: Stereo Remote Mic
addons.description:
An upgrade that allows increased three-dimensional audio tracking.
  • Reduces the duration of the Disabled State of Drones to 85 % of its default value.

addons.name: Supercharge
addons.description:
The batteries may run a little hot, but removing the safety protocols from the cells makes them last a little longer.
  • Extends the Battery life of Claw Traps by +15 %.

addons.name: Brown Noise Generator
addons.description:
An ominous hum disseminates from the Drone, blanketing the soundscape and making it difficult to hear anything else.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

addons.name: Infrared Upgrade
addons.description:
Heat-detecting cameras focus in on high-stress individuals with pinpoint accuracy.
  • The Auras of Claw-Trapped Survivors are revealed to you for 4 seconds after they remove their Claw-Trap.

addons.name: Loose Screw
addons.description:
A bone-chilling rattling emanates from the Drone, and it seems like it may fall at any moment, distracting Survivors from complicated tasks.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Powdered Glass
addons.description:
Once used on the strings used for battle kites, this powdered glass took on a much more nefarious purpose on her blade.
  • Claw-Trapped Survivors suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 70 seconds, when hit with a Basic Attack.

addons.name: Vital Targeting Processor
addons.description:
An additional process in the Drone's programming more accurately predicts the weaknesses of potential prey.
  • Increases the strength of the Hindered Status Effect for Claw-Trapped Survivors when detected by Drones by -2 %.

addons.name: Advanced Movement Prediction
addons.description:
Even after they leave the zone of influenced, a refined AI programme predicts with high accuracy where a person will go next.
  • The Auras of newly Claw-Trapped Survivors are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Geographical Readout
addons.description:
The Drones generate and communicate a detailed three-dimensional map of the terrain, making traversal easier.
  • Increases the Action speeds for breaking Breakable Walls and Pallets, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows by +20 % for 8 seconds after deploying a Drone.

addons.name: Prototype Rotor
addons.description:
The cutting-edge design allows the Drone to move with razor-sharp precision.
  • Increases the Rotational speed of the Scan Lines of Drones by +10 %.

addons.name: Randomised Strobes
addons.description:
Lights flash randomly on the ground, making it harder to find purchase on the uneven terrain.
  • Extends the duration of the Hindered Status Effect for Claw-Trapped Survivors when detected by Drones by +1 second.

addons.name: Expired Batteries
addons.description:
The batteries on these Claw Traps have been swapped out with old alkaline batteries.
Recharging is not recommended.
  • All Survivors start the Trial with a Claw Trap.
  • The first Claw Trap has a reduced Battery Life of 50 %.
  • The second Claw Trap has a restored Battery Life of 100 %.
  • Increases the Battery Life by a stack-able +10 % for each successive Claw Trap a Survivor receives, up to a maximum duration of 150 %.

addons.name: Iridescent Unpublished Manuscript
addons.description:
"Before he disappeared, Adriana's father had started a newer, darker manga: Sonhadores Sombrios."

Whenever any Drone enters its Disabled State, you benefit from the following effects:

  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds.
  • The disabled Drone emits a Terror Radius of 32 metres for 15 seconds.
"When evil is on the loose, it cannot escape from Adi Valente!" — Quote on the cover of Adi Valente #1

addons.name: Greasy Paper Plate
addons.description:
"It sticks to everything it touches.
No amount of soap can wash it off."

While removing the Fire Axe embedded in them, the Survivor suffers from the following effect:

  • Increases the Removal time by +15 %.

addons.name: Help Wanted Ad
addons.description:
"We all need a little help sometimes..."

While winding up an axe throw, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Shows the starting trajectory of the Fire Axe.

addons.name: Restaurant Menu
addons.description:
"The lamination is peeling and crusty.
How appetising."

While retrieving the Fire Axe whenever it is embedded in the environment, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Reduces the minimum Retrieval time by -20 %.

addons.name: Rotten Pizza
addons.description:
"Food poisoning is no laughing matter."

You benefit from the following effect:

  • Increases the duration of Killer Instinct from the Fire Axe by +100 %.

addons.name: Office Phone
addons.description:
"He tried to leave messages as a warning.
He did not last long, either."

While within 24 metres of the Survivor embedded with the Fire Axe, the following primary effects are applied to other Survivors:

  • Decreases the time required to remove the Fire Axe from another Survivor by -50 %.
  • Reveals the Aura of the Fire Axe.
  • Inflicts the Oblivious Status Effect.

Additionally, if they are in the Injured State, they also suffer from the secondary effect:

  • Inflicts the Broken Status Effect.

addons.name: Party Hat
addons.description:
"The party never ends, no matter how much they beg."

While the Fire Axe is embedded in the environment, the following effects apply:

  • Increases the maximum size of the Area of Effect by +250 %.
  • Increases the expansion time of the Area of Effect by +2.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the duration of the Area of Effect by -20 %.

addons.name: Ripped Curtain
addons.description:
"Taken from Pirates Cove, caught on the animatronic that lived there."

Survivors hit with the Fire Axe suffer from the following effects:

  • Inflicts the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Security Guard's Badge
addons.description:
"The badge comes with certain privileges for whoever carries it."

Upon exiting a Security Door after teleporting to it, the following effect applies:

  • Extends the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +25 % to 25 seconds.

addons.name: Streamers
addons.description:
"Employees would throw them over the rafters for a quick decoration."

While travelling through the Security Doors, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Increases your Movement Speed by +15 %.

addons.name: Bonnie's Guitar Strings
addons.description:
"Worn strings that are off-tune and liable to snap."

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability while moving between Security Doors:

  • The intensity of the Generator Auras reveals their current Repair progress.
Upon exiting a Security Door after teleporting to it, the following effect applies:
  • Reduces the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by -100 % to 0 seconds.
    • This causes the Status Effect to be removed instantly.

addons.name: Chica's Bib
addons.description:
"A good way to keep Mr Cupcake from making a mess."

While inside the Area of Effect of the Fire Axe, Survivors suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts the Exhausted Status Effect.
    • This effect lingers for 5 seconds after leaving the Area of Effect.

addons.name: Foxy's Hook
addons.description:
"A pirate's hook that seems more menacing than playful."

While inside the Area of Effect of the Fire Axe, Players benefit from the following effect:

  • Grants a +7 % Haste Status Effect.
    • This effect lingers for 6 seconds after leaving the Area of Effect.

addons.name: Freddy's Hat
addons.description:
"Gabriel trusted the wrong grown-up.
Now he is the star of the show."

Modifies the trajectory of the Fire Axe:

  • Increases the weight of the Fire Axe by +100 %.

addons.name: Purple Guy Drawing
addons.description:
"He only takes 10 seconds to draw!"

While a Survivor has the Fire Axe embedded in them, whenever they perform a Rushed action of any kind, Purple Guy Drawing triggers its primary effect:

  • Their Aura is revealed to you for 3 seconds.
After removing the Fire Axe by themselves, Purple Guy Drawing triggers its secondary effect:
  • Their Aura is revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Access Panel
addons.description:
"Gaining control over the security doors is key to getting the job done."

Unlocks a special ability for the Fire Axe:

  • The Fire Axe can travel through Security Doors and will exit straight through the connected Security Door.
While aiming the Fire Axe, you benefit from the following effect:
  • Survivors within 4 metres of any Security Door trigger Killer Instinct.

addons.name: Celebrate! Poster
addons.description:
"The celebration lasts all night long, or until no one is left."

After embedding the Fire Axe in a Survivor, all Players benefit from the following effects while within 32 metres of that Survivor:

  • Grants a +12 % Haste Status Effect.
  • Increases the Vaulting speed by +20 %.
Both effects last until the Fire Axe is removed.

addons.name: Endo CPU
addons.description:
"Greater computing power, for greater efficacy."

While inside the Area of Effect of the embedded Fire Axe, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Increases the Action speeds for Breaking and Damaging by +40 %.
    • This effect lingers for 5 seconds after leaving the Area of Effect.

addons.name: Loot Bag
addons.description:
"Open the bag, and see what goodies are inside."

While a Survivor has the Fire Axe embedded in them, they suffer from the following effect:

  • Blocks the Exit Gates for that Survivor and also for all other Survivors within 12 metres of them.

addons.name: Faz-Coin
addons.description:
"Collecting these tokens comes with a price."

Upon throwing the Fire Axe, the following effects are applied:

  • Causes the Fire Axe to emit a copy of your Terror Radius until it is retrieved.
    • This Terror Radius is set to 24 metres.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 10 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Remnant
addons.description:
"Molten metal — in the right hands, it is the key to immortality."

Upon travelling to a Security Door, the following effect is applied to it:

  • Blocks all upright Pallets within 32 metres of that Security Door for 12 seconds.

addons.name: Friendship Bracelet
addons.description:
A wide grey and red braided rope bracelet.
The inscription "F. J. S. J." can be seen, crudely written in bold black ink.
  • Extends the Lunge duration of Feral Slashes by +0.3 seconds, which increases your Attack range.

addons.name: Mischief List
addons.description:
A list of mischievous missions to accomplish, memento of brighter days.
  • Extends the duration of Feral Frenzy by +1 second.

addons.name: Scratched Ruler
addons.description:
A wooden ruler deeply scratched with hash marks.
  • Reduces the Recovery time of Feral Frenzy by -5 seconds.

addons.name: Smiley Face Pin
addons.description:
A friendly looking, bright yellow button used as a sarcastic statement.
  • Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds after mending themselves.

addons.name: Defaced Smiley Pin
addons.description:
A once friendly looking, bright yellow button of a defaced smiley.
A signature icon of The Legion.
  • Survivors suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 60 seconds after mending themselves.

addons.name: Etched Ruler
addons.description:
A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.
  • Survivors hit with a Feral Slash suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Julie's Mix Tape
addons.description:
A dark and depressing mix tape made out from mainly power ballads and gloomy melodies.
  • Instantly recharges Feral Frenzy after being stunned by any means while using it.
  • Unlocks an additional sound layer in the Terror Radius, enhancing it musically.

Julie's Mix Tape can be combined with any other Mix Tape Add-on to unlock multiple sound layer combos.

addons.name: Mural Sketch
addons.description:
A rough sketch of The Legion mural torn from a notebook.
  • Increases the stack-able Movement Speed boost gained from chained Feral Slashes by +0.08 m/s to +0.32 m/s, up to a maximum of +1.28 m/s.

addons.name: Never-Sleep Pills
addons.description:
Highly caffeinated tablets to make you extra sharp for exams or draining activities.
  • Extends the duration of Feral Frenzy by +10 seconds.
  • Reduces the starting Movement speed of Feral Frenzy to 4.6 m/s.
  • Grants a stack-able +100 bonus Bloodpoints for successful Feral Slashes, up to a maximum of +500.

addons.name: Joey's Mix Tape
addons.description:
A mix of bangin' tracks and slammin' beats for chillaxin' when life's a bitch.
  • Survivors suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed after mending themselves.
  • Unlocks an additional sound layer in the Terror Radius, enhancing it musically.

Joey's Mix Tape can be combined with any other Mix Tape Add-on to unlock multiple sound layer combos.

addons.name: Stolen Sketch Book
addons.description:
A sketch book with imaginative and evocative, if not slightly bizarre sketches.
  • Causes Survivors hit with chained Feral Slashes to drop any carried Item.

addons.name: Stylish Sunglasses
addons.description:
Oval-shaped sunglasses that exude poise and cool.
Their colour-tinted lenses add an understated appeal.
  • The Auras of Survivors mending themselves within 24 metres of your location are revealed to you.

addons.name: Susie's Mix Tape
addons.description:
A fast and thrilling mix tape with energising songs with break-neck beats.
  • Increases the Detection radius of Killer Instinct by +20 metres.
  • Unlocks an additional sound layer in the Terror Radius, enhancing it musically.

Susie's Mix Tape can be combined with any other Mix Tape Add-on to unlock multiple sound layer combos.

addons.name: The Legion Pin
addons.description:
A handmade button with the face of The Legion.
To use exclusively on intimidation dares.
  • Survivors suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 60 seconds after mending themselves.

addons.name: BFFs
addons.description:
An unnaturally cold silver necklace split into four, one for each best friend.

Survivors hit with chained Feral Slashes grant Tokens towards BFFs:

  • Grants 0 Tokens for the first Feral Slash.
  • Grants +2 Tokens for the second Feral Slash.
  • Grants +3 Tokens for the third Feral Slash.
  • Grants +4 Tokens for the fourth Feral Slash.
  • Grants +5 Tokens for the fifth Feral Slash.
Once the Exit Gates are powered and BFFs has acquired 15+ Tokens, you benefit from the following effect:
  • Grants a +6 % Haste Status Effect outside of using Feral Frenzy.

addons.name: Filthy Blade
addons.description:
This blade is stained with foul spots of blood and grime that make injuries particularly difficult to mend.
  • Increases the Mending time of Survivors by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Frank's Mix Tape
addons.description:
Never go on a kill mission without your tunes.
A track list of massive distortions and loud percussion that stabs at your eardrums.

During Feral Frenzy, you benefit from the following effects:

  • Pauses the Power Gauge depletion while performing the Break or Damage action.
  • Increases the Action speed for damaging Generators by +20 %.
  • Increases the Action speed for breaking Breakable Walls by +30 %.
  • Unlocks an additional sound layer in the Terror Radius, enhancing it musically.
Frank's Mix Tape can be combined with any other Mix Tape Add-on to unlock multiple sound layer combos.

addons.name: Stab Wounds Study
addons.description:
A printed medical article stolen from Ormond's public library, vulgarising a study on lesions and stab wounds.
  • The Auras of Survivors are revealed to you for 4 seconds after they mend themselves.

addons.name: Fuming Mix Tape
addons.description:
Dark beats, violent shreds and unfathomable vocals from another world fill the mind with a vibrating sixth sense.
  • During Feral Frenzy, the intensity of the Generator Auras reveals their current Repair progress.
  • Causes all partially repaired Generators to start regressing.
  • Unlocks an additional sound layer in the Terror Radius, enhancing it musically.

The Fuming Mix Tape can be combined with any other Mix Tape Add-on to unlock multiple sound layer combos.

addons.name: Iridescent Button
addons.description:
A glass-like button moulded from The Fog that captures The Legion's likeness.
The surface is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
  • Causes Feral Vaults to instantly break vaulted Pallets.

"The youth consumed by the iridescent glass magnifies and widens the reach of The Entity."

addons.name: Gritty Lump
addons.description:
A rock-hard, dense loaf filled their stomachs on most days, giving them the energy to commit truly heinous acts.
  • Increases the Movement Speed of Guards during the Patrol Phase by +9 %.

addons.name: Map of the Realm
addons.description:
These unique leather maps were not easy to come by, but when they could not be purchased, they could be taken by force.
  • Increases the Vision range of a Guard during the Patrol Phase by +2 metres.

addons.name: Pillaged Mead
addons.description:
Drinks taken from their victims tasted sweet, but such frivolities were often short-lived.
  • Reduces the duration of the Break or Damage action of a Guard by -10 %.

addons.name: Tattered Tabard
addons.description:
Cloaked in heavy fabrics, neither human nor nature could stop them once they had their target.
  • Extends the duration of the Patrol Phase by +8 seconds.

addons.name: Battle Axe Head
addons.description:
Sander Rault was a tower of a man, terrifying in form and demeanour.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after summoning The Carnifex by -20 %.

addons.name: Call to Arms
addons.description:
"Posted across many towns, lords desperate to protect their riches posted for able-bodied mercenaries. None survived."

Modifies the Patrol Path with the following effects:

  • Increases its maximum length by +4 metres.
  • Increases its Drawing speed by +7 %.

addons.name: Cold Steel Manacles
addons.description:
Alejandro Santiago apprenticed as an armourer and showed no remorse.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after summoning The Jailer by -20 %.

addons.name: Dried Horsemeat
addons.description:
Long campaigns often required restocking, and the steeds of fallen enemies were as good as any farm-fresh ration.
  • Extends the duration of a Hunt by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Treated Blade
addons.description:
Durkos Malecek stuck to the shadows, and was an efficient slaughterer.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after summoning The Assassin by -20 %.

addons.name: Broken Hilt
addons.description:
A fresh weapon is clean, even surgical; an attack with a broken one is malicious and desperate.
  • Survivors damaged by a Guard suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Grim Iron Mask
addons.description:
No method of torture was too base for Guardia Compagnia.
Pain and humiliation went hand-in-hand.
  • Survivors detected by a Guard during the Patrol Phase suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 75 seconds.

addons.name: Ironworker's Tongs
addons.description:
Vital for repairs between battles and a horrifying, gauging, tearing improvisational weapon.
  • Causes Survivors to suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds, if a Guard fails to damage them during a Hunt.

addons.name: Sharpened Mount
addons.description:
To stand before the Standard of the Guardia Compagnia was to stand at the threshold between life and death.
  • Increases the Spawn duration of Standards by +15 %.

addons.name: Town Watch's Torch
addons.description:
Upon breaching a village, the first thing they would extinguish was the torches, and with them, hope.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect during a Hunt.

addons.name: Blacksmith's Hammer
addons.description:
In their hands, everything was a weapon.
  • Causes Survivors damaged by a Guard during a Hunt to suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Flint and Steel
addons.description:
Attacks at night were not uncommon.
Fear was often their greatest ally.

Summoning The Carnifex has the following effect:

  • The Auras of all Survivors within 24 metres of unbroken Pallets are revealed to you for 8 seconds.

addons.name: Healing Poultice
addons.description:
Their reputation was so large, so horrible, that the mere knowledge that they were coming was enough to bring people to their knees.

Summoning The Assassin has the following effect:

  • The Auras of all Survivors within 8 metres of his Spawn location are revealed to you for 8 seconds.

addons.name: Jailer's Chimes
addons.description:
Many captives met the same grisly end for attempting to escape his clutches.
  • The Auras of Survivors crossing the Patrol Path of The Jailer are revealed to you for 8 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Company Banner
addons.description:
Where this banner was raised, those who called themselves 'civilised' ran and hid, because for all their codes and laws, they had nothing resembling actual strength.
  • Causes all Windows on the Patrol Path to be blocked to all Survivors for 25 seconds after summoning a Guard.
  • Causes all Windows vaulted by the Hunted Survivor to be blocked to all other Survivors for the duration of the Hunt.
  • Causes the Exit Gates to be blocked to the Hunted Survivor for the duration of the Hunt.

"They huddle in their villages like parasites! They have lost the drive for power." — Tarhos Kovács

addons.name: Knight's Contract
addons.description:
The original document contracting Tarhos to Vittorio's employ.
The laws of man could not stand up, though, to natural law.
  • Causes a Guard to linger around for 8 seconds after completing a Guard Order, triggering a Hunt, should he detect a Survivor in that time.

"I fear he has left me here to die." — Vittorio Toscano

addons.name: Cereal Rations
addons.description:
Contains 100 % of the recommended daily intake of Vitamin A.
Tastes awful.

While inside the Tunnels, you benefit from the following effect:

  • The Auras of deployed Remote Flame Turrets are revealed to you.
    • This effect lingers for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Drinking Bird
addons.description:
One of the many tchotchkes littering the Nostromo's living quarters.
A bit of whimsy in an otherwise sterile environment.
  • Increases the duration of Killer Instinct after exiting the Tunnels by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Ovomorph
addons.description:
It looks harmless, but the horrors held inside are immeasurable.
  • Increases the Charge rate of Crawler Mode while outside the Tunnels by +25 %.

addons.name: Ripley's Watch
addons.description:
On a ship as massive as the Nostromo, synchronising watches was important to keep track of work shifts.
  • Causes Remote Flame Turrets to self-destruct after knocking you out of Crawler Mode.

addons.name: Ash's Innards
addons.description:
While hardier, mechanical beings break too when enough force is applied.
  • Increases the Respawn timer of Remote Flame Turrets by +15 seconds.

addons.name: Brett's Cap
addons.description:
This Nostromo ballcap was fashionable, but severely limited his vertical field of vision.

Whenever a Remote Flame Turret is destroyed by any means, it triggers the following effect:

  • Causes all Survivors within 16 metres of its location to suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 25 seconds.

addons.name: Crew Headset
addons.description:
While they facilitated team communication, the constant chatter made the crew easier to track.
  • Increases the Detection range of Survivor Footsteps when inside the Tunnels by +6 metres.

addons.name: Lambert's Star Map
addons.description:
Vital for interstellar travel, but not as useful on a smaller scale.
  • Reduces the Attack range of Remote Flame Turrets by -2 metres.

addons.name: Light Wand
addons.description:
A portable light source used by Ash and Dallas while looking for the invasive creature.
Mostly ineffective for lighting larger spaces.
  • Increases the temporary downtime of Remote Flame Turrets whenever you exit the Tunnels by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Emergency Helmet
addons.description:
An extra helmet on the bridge, for use in emergencies only.
  • Increases the Resistance towards Remote Flame Turrets before being knocked out of Crawler Mode by +15 %.

addons.name: Kane's Helmet
addons.description:
A thin layer of glass was the difference between a minor inconvenience and the tragic destruction of the Nostromo's crew.
  • Survivors hit with a successful Tail Attack suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Moulted Skin
addons.description:
The Xenomorph moulted many times as it rapidly grew on the Nostromo.
Its shed skin was a constant reminder of its presence.
  • After deploying a Remote Flame Turret, Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 30 seconds.

addons.name: Multipurpose Hatchet
addons.description:
Equally useful for destruction and repair.
  • Survivors hit with a successful Tail Strike attack suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until fully healed.

addons.name: Parker's Headband
addons.description:
A bold fashion choice that doubled as a handy way to wick sweat from the eyes.
  • Grants a +5 % Haste Status Effect for 3 seconds after exiting the Tunnels.

addons.name: Cat Carrier
addons.description:
Saving the cat is a noble goal.
It's also very distracting.

Whenever a Remote Flame Turret knocks you out of Crawler Mode, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 30 seconds.

addons.name: Harpoon Gun
addons.description:
Barely a weapon, its use is only viable in a situation of last resort.

Hitting a Survivor within 30 seconds of exiting the Tunnels triggers the following effect:

  • Causes all other Survivors farther than 16 metres from your location to scream and reveal their location to you.

addons.name: Self-Destruct Bolt
addons.description:
They needed to be removed to start, and replaced to end, the self-destruct sequence.
Just seeing them evokes a sense of urgency.
  • Increases the Vaulting speed while in Crawler Mode by +30 %.

addons.name: Semiotic Keyboard
addons.description:
Its symbols are designed to be universally recognisable, but they may take some getting used to.

Causes Generators within 16 metres of a Remote Flame Turret to experience the following effect:

  • The intensity of the Generator Aura reveals its current Repair progress to you.

addons.name: Acidic Blood
addons.description:
When damaged, The Xenomorph's unique physiology made it deadlier than ever.

While in Crawler Mode, whenever a Survivor stuns you by any means within 20 seconds of you exiting the Tunnels, either of the following effects applies:

  • Healthy Survivor: Removes 1 Health State.
  • Injured Survivor: Inflicts the Deep Wound Status Effect.
"I think we oughta discuss the bonus situation." — Parker

addons.name: Improvised Cattle Prod
addons.description:
A brutal and noisy weapon, which might have been more effective against a cow.

Whenever a Generator is completed, the following effect applies for 15 seconds:

  • While the effect is active, the Aura of any Survivor coming within 10 metres of a Control Station are revealed to you for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Amanita Toxin
addons.description:
A toxin from the Amanita mushroom, applied to the Hatchet's blade.
It numbs the mind.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Bandaged Haft
addons.description:
First-aid bandages securely rolled and attached to the Hatchet's haft.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration between successive Hatchet throws by -10 %.

addons.name: Coarse Stone
addons.description:
This stone is too coarse to do any good.
A blade damaged by it inflicts awful open wounds.
  • Increases the volume of Grunts of Pain of injured Survivors hit by Hatchets by +50 %.

addons.name: Yellowed Cloth
addons.description:
A simple scrap of material to tend to blisters and wipe the puss away.
  • Increases the Projectile speed of Hatchets by +10 %.

addons.name: Leather Loop
addons.description:
The right tool in the right hands is key to a successful hunt.
  • Successfully hitting a Survivor with a Hatchet grants a +2 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Manna Grass Braid
addons.description:
A circular decorative braid made from manna grass.
This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
  • Reduces the Wind-up time of Hatchets by -8 %.

addons.name: Oak Haft
addons.description:
A polished haft which allows for a quick and sly manipulation of the deadly tool.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration between successive Hatchet throws by -20 %.

addons.name: Shiny Pin
addons.description:
A copper pin defaced beyond recognition yet polished to a high sheen.
Pillaged from a particularly difficult prey.
  • Increases the Movement speed while winding Hatchets up by +5 %.

addons.name: Weighted Head
addons.description:
An oddly weighted Hatchet head, crafted to deliver a hard blow to its target.
It requires a wielder with a strong arm.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Incapacitated Status Effect for 10 seconds.

addons.name: Deerskin Gloves
addons.description:
Cured leather gloves that protect the hands and give a sure grip.
  • Reduces the Reload time of Hatchets at Lockersto 80 % of its default value.

addons.name: Flower Babushka
addons.description:
A clean and colourful handkerchief adorned with a flower pattern.
This memory of a lost little one fills The Huntress with rage and focus.
  • Reduces the Wind-up time of Hatchets by -0.1 seconds.

addons.name: Rose Root
addons.description:
Dried petals that relieve symptoms of fatigue and overexertion when brewed in a tea.
  • Increases the Projectile speed of Hatchets by +20 %.

addons.name: Rusty Head
addons.description:
This Hatchet head is covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal from.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Venomous Concoction
addons.description:
A toxic concoction, applied to the Hatchet's blade.
The murky concoction is mainly composed of Berus Snake venom, which gives it fatiguing capabilities.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Begrimed Head
addons.description:
This Hatchet head is stained with a foul substance that afflicts anyone who it touches with debilities.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 80 seconds.

addons.name: Glowing Concoction
addons.description:
An otherworldly concoction that faintly glows a foreboding light.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets have their Aura revealed to you for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Infantry Belt
addons.description:
A sturdy utility belt pillaged from a soldier.
He was quick in combat, but she was quicker.
  • Successfully hitting a Survivor with a Hatchet grants a +3 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Wooden Fox
addons.description:
Roughly carved, this fox statuette is no more than a few inches.
A reminder that stealth and cunning is as effective as raw power.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect after reloading at Lockers for 30 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Head
addons.description:
A glass-like Hatchet head moulded from The Fog itself.
The blade is warm and reverberating with The Entity's power.
  • Survivors hit by Hatchets are automatically put into the Dying State.
  • Reduces the number of carried Hatchets to 1.

"The iridescent glass cuts through flesh and soul."

addons.name: Soldier's Puttee
addons.description:
A wrap taken from a dead soldier.
It provides protection and support to the ankle and lower leg.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Huntress to 4.6 m/s while out of Hatchets.

addons.name: Combat Straps
addons.description:
Leather straps that hold fabric in place for nimbler movement.
  • Increases the Transition speed into the Crouched State by +10 %.

addons.name: Interlocking Razor
addons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
The addition of interlocking razor blades makes it impossible to move suddenly in the Jigsaw Box without slitting one's wrists.
  • While injured, Survivors failing a Skill Check at a Jigsaw Box become afflicted by the Deep Wound Status Effect.

addons.name: John's Medical File
addons.description:
"The medical file of a cancerous man.
Fills the reader with dread and recklessness."

You benefit from the following effect:

  • Increases your Movement speed while Crouched by +5 %.

addons.name: Shattered Syringe
addons.description:
Symbol of a broken way of life.
Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of missed Ambush Dash Attacks by -10 %.

addons.name: Face Mask
addons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
The heavy cloth face mask, laced with a sedative, partially suffocates the target, making it hard to concentrate.
  • Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer permanently from the Blindness Status Effect.

addons.name: Last Will
addons.description:
"A latched wooden box with a satin lining, offered as part of a last will."

Modifies the Ambush Dash attack with the following effects:

  • Increases its Movement speed by +5 %.
  • Increases its Charge time by +10 %.

addons.name: Razor Wires
addons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
The addition of razor sharp wires makes it extra difficult and potentially painful to search them.
  • While healthy, Survivors failing a Skill Check at a Jigsaw Box become injured.
  • Increases the Skill Check difficulty by +20 %.

addons.name: Utility Blades
addons.description:
A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
Sharp blades attached to the Trap's interior lacerate the victim with every movement.
  • Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect whenever they are injured by any means.

addons.name: Workshop Grease
addons.description:
"A simple tube of grease, used to lubricate the mechanisms of the hidden blade."

Modifies the Ambush Dash attack with the following effects:

  • Increases its Charge speed by +50 %.

addons.name: Bag of Gears
addons.description:
"A few mechanical parts that allow the creation of challenging Jigsaw Boxes and easier to install Reverse Bear Traps."

While attaching a Reverse Bear Trap to a downed Survivor, Bag of Gears applies its primary effect:

  • Increases your Action speed by +50 %.
Survivors searching a Jigsaw Box, Bag of Gears applies its secondary effect:
  • Reduces their Action speed by -14 %.

addons.name: Jigsaw's Annotated Plan
addons.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design laid down on paper and annotated by Jigsaw.
  • Increases the number of carried Reverse Bear Traps by +1.
  • Increases the Death timer of Reverse Bear Traps by +10 seconds.
  • Reduces the Death timer of all Active Reverse Bear Traps by -10 seconds each time a Generator is completed.

addons.name: Rules Set No.2
addons.description:
Not all games need to have the same rules.
  • Disables the ability of Survivors to see the Auras of Jigsaw Boxes, until their Reverse Bear Trap becomes active.

"Listen, there are rules." — Jigsaw

addons.name: Rusty Attachments
addons.description:
"A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
Mouth spikes, covered with crusty and volatile rust spots that make injuries particularly difficult to heal."

Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Slow-Release Toxin
addons.description:
"A modification to the Reverse Bear Trap:
A poison that is not fatal, but weakens the body and makes it nearly impossible to recover fully from any effort."

Survivors caught in a Reverse Bear Trap suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts the Exhausted Status Effect.

addons.name: Amanda's Secret
addons.description:
A black metal box containing a knife and various medical supplies, such as bandages and compresses.
Deep cuts reduce stress and awaken the senses.
  • Survivors removing their Reverse Bear Trap trigger a Loud Noise Notification and have their Auras revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Crate of Gears
addons.description:
"This collection of mechanical parts allows the creation of extra-challenging Jigsaw Boxes and Reverse Bear Traps that are easier to install."

While attaching a Reverse Bear Trap to a downed Survivor, Crate of Gears applies its primary effect:

  • Increases your Action speed by +50 %.
Survivors searching a Jigsaw Box, Crate of Gears applies its secondary effect:
  • Reduces their Action speed by -25 %.

addons.name: Jigsaw's Sketch
addons.description:
A disturbing, yet brilliant, trap design sketched in detail on a sheet of paper.
  • Increases the number of carried Reverse Bear Traps by +1.
  • The Auras of Generators being repaired by Survivors wearing a Reverse Bear Traps are highlighted to you in yellow.

addons.name: Tampered Timer
addons.description:
A timer that has been fiddled with.
A spring in the mechanism forces the gears to turn faster.
  • Reduces the Death timer of Reverse Bear Traps by -20 seconds.

addons.name: Amanda's Letter
addons.description:
A blackmailing Letter for the attention of Amanda.
Fills the reader with rage and focus.
  • The Auras of Survivors within 16 metres are revealed to you when Crouched.
  • Reduces the number of carried Reverse Bear Traps by -2.

"Amanda, you were with Cecil the night Jill lost Gideon. You killed their child. You know it and I know it." — Detective Hoffman

addons.name: Video Tape
addons.description:
A recording of Jigsaw, explaining the game's rules to Amanda.
Reminiscing about her past-self hardens her determination.
  • All Survivors start the Trial with a Reverse Bear Trap attached to them.

addons.name: "Philly"
addons.description:
A stolen camera from a victim of Olsen in Philadelphia, where he worked before.
The film inside captured his last night in the city.
  • Reduces the Time to mark Survivors by -10 %.

"Gotta love Philly: keeps giving and giving and I do not wanna forget any of it." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Cheap Cologne
addons.description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol.
Worn by The Ghost Face to make his presence known.
Reserved for impromptu visits.
  • Increases the duration of Marked by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Headline Cut-Outs
addons.description:
Cut-outs of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania.
While The Ghost Face just authored some of the headlines, he committed all of the murders.
Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
  • Increases your Movement speed while Stalking by +40 %.

addons.name: Walleye's Matchbook
addons.description:
A sheet of matches from Walleye's, a small bar in Northern Roseville.
A victim's phone number is scribbled in blue.
One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
  • Reduces the Power Recharge time by -3 seconds.

addons.name: Cinch Straps
addons.description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
  • Causes Night Shroud to remain active on missed Basic Attacks.

addons.name: Marked Map
addons.description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida.
Each 'X' represents a victim of The Ghost Face.
Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
  • Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Olsen's Address Book
addons.description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing.
All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.
  • The Auras of Marked Survivors performing rushed actions are revealed to you for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Olsen's Journal
addons.description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries.
The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims.
Going through your past methods triggers thrilling memories.
  • Marked Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

addons.name: Telephoto Lens
addons.description:
A manual focus lens to remain undetected while taking pictures from afar.
  • Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds after revealing you.

addons.name: Chewed Pen
addons.description:
A blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny's DNA.
Incriminating evidence that was never found.
  • Increases the Reveal time for Survivors in the Dying State to 3 seconds.

addons.name: Knife Belt Clip
addons.description:
A perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly.
No one knows what you are planning to do tonight.
  • Reduces your Terror Radius by -12 metres when Crouched.

addons.name: Lasting Perfume
addons.description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by The Ghost Face to announce his presence.
Reserved for the victims he planned to write about.
  • Increases the Reveal time for Survivors on a Hook to 3 seconds.

addons.name: Leather Knife Sheath
addons.description:
A quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade.
Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
  • Increases your Movement Speed by +10 % when Crouched.

addons.name: Olsen's Wallet
addons.description:
Olsen's wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen's first Roseville victim.
Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
  • Instantly recharges Night Shroud after breaking a Breakable Wall or a Pallet.

addons.name: Driver's License
addons.description:
A driver's license revealing Olsen's true identity: Danny Johnson.
  • Causes Generators to explode and lose -20 % of its maximum possible Progression, when marking a Survivor repairing it, and blocks it for 15 seconds.
    • This penalty is only once if multiple repairing Survivors are marked.

"They all want to know who Ghost Face is. But what they should ask is: who is next?" — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath
addons.description:
A sheath allowing for a full motion range: ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely.
Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.
  • Grants a +10 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds after marking a Survivor.

"Gotta get ready like a scout — without the stupid patches. What I get is much better." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Night Vision Monocular
addons.description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness.
Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 10 seconds after revealing you.

addons.name: Victim's Detailed Routine
addons.description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville.
Compiling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate their movements.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds after marking them.

"I have been watching you for a while. I wanted this to be special; the kind of headlines that people do not forget." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: "Ghost Face Caught on Tape"
addons.description:
A tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorised Roseville.
  • Instantly recharges Night Shroud after putting a Survivor into the Dying State with a Basic Attack.

"In this footage, a dark figure is seen entering a house late at night in Northern Roseville, Florida.
The police were called the next morning to report a murder in the area.
Lock your doors: a Killer is in our midst, roaming freely, like a ghost in the night." — The Roseville Gazette

addons.name: Outdoor Security Camera
addons.description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed The Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville.
The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of The Ghost Face without providing any real clue to the police.
  • The Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for 7 seconds after putting a Marked Survivor into the Dying State.

"An image is worth a thousand words." — The Ghost Face

addons.name: Black Heart
addons.description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.
  • Reduces the Attack cool-down of successful Shred Attacks used to hit Survivors by -10 %.

addons.name: Rat Liver
addons.description:
A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.
  • Increases your Movement speed while holding Of the Abyss by +3.5 %.

addons.name: Rat Tail
addons.description:
A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.
  • Increases the Opening speed of Portals by +50 %.

addons.name: Rotten Pumpkin
addons.description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.
  • Causes the Portal from which you start your Teleport to seal automatically.
  • Grants +200 bonus Bloodpoints for Interdimensional Travel Score Events.

addons.name: Barb's Glasses
addons.description:
A broken pair of glasses that travelled to the Upside Down.
  • Reduces the Attack cool-down of successful Shred Attacks used to break Breakable Walls or Pallets by -10 %.

addons.name: Mews' Guts
addons.description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.
  • Reduces the Attack cool-down of missed Shred Attacks by -11 %.
  • Increases the number of available Portals by +1.

addons.name: Rotten Green Tripe
addons.description:
Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.
  • Increases your Teleportation speed by +15 %.

addons.name: Sticky Lining
addons.description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the interdimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the Area of Effect of active Portals by +2.5 metres.

addons.name: Viscous Webbing
addons.description:
Wet, elastic webs that broaden the interdimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +10 %.

addons.name: Brass Case Lighter
addons.description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.
  • Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect while closing Portals.
    • This effect lingers for 60 seconds.

"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Deer Lung
addons.description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.
  • Increases your Teleportation speed by +30 %.
  • Reduces the number of available Portals by -2.

addons.name: Eleven's Soda
addons.description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.
  • The Auras of Generators actively being repaired by Survivors are highlighted to you in yellow while traversing the Upside Down.

addons.name: Thorny Vines
addons.description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the interdimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the Area of Effect of active Portals by +1 metre.
  • Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +8 %.

addons.name: Violet Waxcap
addons.description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.

After traversing the Upside Down, the following effect applies:

  • Extends the Undetectable Status Effect gained after emerging from a Portal by +1 second to 6 seconds.

addons.name: Lifeguard Whistle
addons.description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.

You benefit from the following effect:

  • Increases the number of available Portals by +2.
"Emits a strong electromagnetic field: it must have come into contact with the Upside Down." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Unknown Egg
addons.description:
A large, warm egg coated in gruesome webbing.
  • Reduces the Recovery time of Of the Abyss by -2.5 seconds.

"A large egg was sighted in the Upside Down, but no sample survived the trip to the lab for proper examination." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Upside Down Resin
addons.description:
A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the interdimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +20 %.

"A sample taken from the bark of the tree once used as a gate. So far our conclusion as to its effect are inconclusive." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Vermilion Webcap
addons.description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.

After traversing the Upside Down, the following effect applies:

  • Extends the Undetectable Status Effect gained after emerging from a Portal by +3 seconds to 8 seconds.
"Still experimenting with this specimen, so far our results are inconsistent." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Leprose Lichen
addons.description:
A potent lichen that grows like dust on the rocks in the Upside Down.
  • The Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you while traversing the Upside Down.
    • This effect lingers for 3 seconds for all Survivors within 16 metres of an active Portal.

"One small dose can cause severe hallucinations." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Red Moss
addons.description:
A psychedelic moss that grows on tree barks in the Upside Down.

After traversing the Upside Down, the following effects apply:

  • Extends the Undetectable Status Effect gained after emerging from a Portal by +8 seconds to 13 seconds.
  • Suppresses all noises related to emerging from a Portal.
  • Increases the time required to emerge from a Portal by +15 %.
"Consuming its leaf enhances athletic performance and causes euphoria." — Hawkins National Laboratory

addons.name: Anteiku Apron
addons.description:
Standard-issue uniform at a lovely little coffee shop.
  • Shortens the slide after Kagune Leaps by -50 %.

addons.name: Kaneki's Wallet
addons.description:
Lost to a strange boy who happened to bump into him on the street.
  • Extends the window of opportunity to perform consecutive Kagune Leaps by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Taiyaki
addons.description:
Ghouls can never eat human food, but they can find ways to pretend.
  • Extends the Countdown by +5 seconds.

addons.name: The Black Goat's Egg
addons.description:
The book he used to bond with a woman of consequence.
  • Succeeding the Quick Time Event during a Grab-Attack grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints.

addons.name: Blood-Stained Handkerchief
addons.description:
Even a single drop of blood can excite the senses of any gourmet.
  • Increases the maximum reach of Kagune Leaps by +1 metre.

addons.name: Broken Chain
addons.description:
Nothing could restrain him once he finally embraced his full potential.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Kagune Leap by -1.4 seconds per Token when outside of Enraged Mode.

addons.name: Hide's Headphones
addons.description:
They belonged to his best friend, who he tried to keep safe at all costs.

Survivors affected by the Kagune Mark experience the following effect while carrying it:

  • Causes them to suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect until the mark is removed.

addons.name: Hinami's Umbrella
addons.description:
It was raining the day her mother was viciously taken from her.
  • Increases the amount of time added to the Countdown for each perfectly timed Grab-Attack by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Kaneki's Satchel
addons.description:
Essential gear for any student trying to keep up with their studies.
  • Increases the Movement speed of the third consecutive Kagune Leap by +4.2 m/s.

addons.name: Amon's Necktie
addons.description:
Cold, calculated, precise.
He had a firm grasp of every situation.

While aiming Mid-Leap, you benefit from the following effect:

  • The Auras of Pallets and Windows are revealed to you within 32 metres.

addons.name: Aogiri Tree Robe
addons.description:
Garments worn by an anti-human ghoul organisation.

Whenever a Generator is completed while in Enraged Mode, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.

addons.name: Mado's Glove
addons.description:
A glove worn by a ghoul investigator.

Survivors affected by the Kagune Mark experience the following effect after it is removed:

  • Causes them to suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Red Spider Lily
addons.description:
The white flowers turned red as blood.

Survivors hit with a Basic Attack while in Enraged Mode inflicts the following effect:

  • Causes them to suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Rize's Glasses
addons.description:
They made her look innocent enough, which was exactly what she wanted.

Upon entering Enraged Mode, you benefit from the following effect:

  • The Auras of healthy Survivors currently repairing a Generator are revealed to you for 8 seconds.

addons.name: CCG ID Card
addons.description:
A card carried by every ghoul investigator.

Performing a Kagune Leap Vault action triggers the following effect:

  • The Auras of all Survivors affected by the Kagune Mark are revealed to you within 24 metres of your location for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Fresh Coffee
addons.description:
Every ghoul's favourite drink, the one human delicacy they can consume.
  • Increases the Movement speed during Kagune Leaps by +2 m/s.

addons.name: Red-Headed Centipede
addons.description:
The thing caused him immeasurable torment.

Performing a Vault action while in Enraged Mode triggers the following effect:

  • Blocks that Window to all Survivors for 10 seconds.

addons.name: Torture Apparatus
addons.description:
A cutting tool used every time his extremities grew back.

Whenever Enraged Mode ends, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Grants a +5 % Haste Status Effect for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Eye Patch
