addons.description:
An innocent way to hide his true nature from the world.

Unlocks potential in the third consecutive Kagune Leap while in Enraged Mode:

  • If used to vault a dropped Pallet, it instantly breaks.

addons.name: Yamori's Mask
addons.description:
Worn by a ghoul from the 13th district whose hobby was torture.

Hooking a Survivor while in Enraged Mode triggers the following effect:

  • Causes all Survivors further than 40 metres to scream and reveal their location to you for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Doll Eyes
addons.description:
One of the advantages of possessing a mass-produced doll is easy access to replacement parts.
  • When in Hidey-Ho Mode, the Auras of all Windows and downed Pallets are revealed to you within 20 metres.

addons.name: Good Guy Box
addons.description:
Someone kept this box around in case they needed to bring Chucky back to the store.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of successful Slice & Dice Attacks to 93 % of their default duration.

addons.name: Strobing Light
addons.description:
With the right training, it can be used to make people more suggestible.
  • Reduces your Terror Radius by -8 metres, when Hidey-Ho Mode is on cool-down.

addons.name: Tiny Scalpel
addons.description:
Sometimes, a precision cut can lead to a beautiful bleed.
  • When in Hidey-Ho Mode, Pools of Blood appear to you in bright red.

addons.name: Automatic Screwdriver
addons.description:
A good way to make mechanical adjustments on the fly.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Hidey-Ho Mode by -8 % after missing a Slice & Dice Attack.

addons.name: Electric Carving Knife
addons.description:
The annoying buzzing sound means it is ready to carve some flesh.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of missed Slice & Dice Attacks to 95 % of their default duration.

addons.name: Hair Spray & Candle
addons.description:
An aerosolised inferno that will ensure a bad hair day is the least of your worries.
  • Reduces the Power-Gauge penalty of Basic Attacks when in Hidey-Ho Mode by -20 %.

addons.name: Jump Rope
addons.description:
Good for a bit of exercise, or for tying up your target.
  • Extends the duration of Slice & Dice to 108 % of its default duration.

addons.name: Power Drill
addons.description:
Comes with a dozen convenient drill tips.
They all make a big mess when applied to people.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of Hidey-Ho Mode by -10 % after successful Slice & Dice Attacks.

addons.name: Portable TV
addons.description:
Small enough for any room.
Just keep it out of the bath.
  • Extends the duration of Slice & Dice to 170 % of its default duration once the Exit Gates have been powered.

addons.name: Rat Poison
addons.description:
The secret ingredient in a killer chilli.

While performing a Slice & Dice attack, benefit from the following effect:

  • The Auras of all Survivors within 6 metres of your location are revealed to you for 2.5 seconds.

addons.name: Running Shoes
addons.description:
The latest in high-performance killer doll athletic technology.
  • Performing a Scamper grants a +2 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Silk Pillow
addons.description:
For when you want to smother your target with silky-smooth softness.
  • Permanently reduces your Terror Radius by -6 metres.
  • Increases the Charge time of Slice & Dice to 150 % of its default duration.

addons.name: Yardstick
addons.description:
Good for measuring distance.
Even better for laying down a beating.
  • Performing a Scamper reveals the Auras of all Survivors within 16 metres of you for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Mirror Shards
addons.description:
A bunch of shattered mirror pieces that reflect light and shadow, further disorienting the already disoriented.
  • Grants the ability to see the Illusory Footfalls around Survivors.

addons.name: Pile of Nails
addons.description:
It is a lot easier to stay hidden when your target is worried about a pile of nails flying at their head.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 3 seconds after manually ending Hidey-Ho Mode.

addons.name: Plastic Bag
addons.description:
Nothing tires out a kill like a lack of oxygen.
  • Survivors walking through an Illusory Footfall suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Straight Razor
addons.description:
For when a close shave needs to be really, really close.
  • Survivors hit with successful Slice & Dice Attacks suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 80 seconds.

addons.name: Hard Hat
addons.description:
Keeps the dome intact while performing high-impact activities
  • Instantly breaksPallets, when performing a Scamper under them.

"A true classic never goes out of style." — Chucky

addons.name: Iridescent Amulet
addons.description:
A pendant of great power, recreated within the Realm.
  • Extends the duration of Hidey-Ho Mode by +50 %.
  • Basic Attacks immediately end Hidey-Ho Mode.

"If I don't get out of this body soon, I'm screwed." — Chucky

addons.name: Broken Security Key
addons.description:
Dozens of security measures were applied across the ship's equipment, and many of them were in a state of disrepair.
  • Reduces the Reboot timer of disabled Biopods by -15 %.

addons.name: Diagnostic Tool (Repair)
addons.description:
A device that can find the flaws in constructed objects.
Intended to help with repair.
  • Increases the Targeting range of Biopods by +4 metres.

addons.name: Heavy Water
addons.description:
A by-product of the micro-fission reactors powering cryo and life support.
Even a tiny leak would prove disastrous for onboard sensors.
  • Reduces the Aura-reveal range of Supply Cases by -8 metres.

addons.name: Nutritional Slurry
addons.description:
Made for the organics, this disgusting concoction works well to nourish any organic matter.
  • Increases the number of carried Biopods by +2.

addons.name: Android Arm
addons.description:
Destroying the other HUX units not only made its extermination of humans easier, it also gave it more parts to work with.
  • Increases the Spreading distance of Temporal Slipstream between Survivors by +2 metres.
  • Increases the Spreading speed of Temporal Slipstream between Survivors by +25 %.

addons.name: Cremated Remains
addons.description:
After extracting the other colonists' DNA, he burned their remains.
  • Slipstreamed Survivors suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.

addons.name: Cryo Gel
addons.description:
A no-friction gel applied to crew members before entering deep cryo sleep.
  • Causes Slipstreamed Survivors hit with a Basic Attack to suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Kid's Ball Glove
addons.description:
A kid's baseball glove owned by one of the colonists.
His memories of a youth playing catch were implanted.
  • Extends the duration of Overclock Mode by +8 %.

addons.name: Ultrasonic Sensor
addons.description:
A limitation of organic hearing is a limited aural spectrum.
Expanding that range is like gaining an entirely new sense.
  • Exiting a Biopod within 2 seconds of afflicting a Survivor with Temporal Slipstream reduces your Terror Radius by -12 metres for 12 seconds.

addons.name: Hologram Generator
addons.description:
Originally used for communication and entertainment, this has been repurposed for obfuscation.
  • After teleporting to a Slipstreamed Survivor from a Biopod, they suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Hyperawareness Spray
addons.description:
Used by crew members during long shifts to avoid lapses in focus.
Side effects of overuse include paranoia and, in extreme cases, hallucination.
  • Causes all Slipstreamed Survivors to hear a fake nearby Terror Radius.

addons.name: Live Wires
addons.description:
Unconnected wires attached to a live current that have a tendency to deliver a shocking surprise.
  • Causes Survivors to scream and interrupt their current interaction after removing Temporal Slipstream.

addons.name: Nanomachine Gel
addons.description:
A gel that can heal wounds extremely quickly.
However, the machines in it have a history of being hacked to hurt people too.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of Biopods after tagging a Survivor with Temporal Slipstream by -15 %.

addons.name: Spent Oxygen Tank
addons.description:
"Without air to breathe, organics do not last long."

Survivors afflicted with Temporal Slipstream suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts the Exhausted Status Effect for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Crew Manifest
addons.description:
A complete list of biographical data on the entire crew of the ship sent to Dvarka.
  • The Aura of a Slipstreamed Survivor infecting another Survivor with Temporal Slipstream is revealed to you for 8 seconds.
  • Increases the Spreading distance of Temporal Slipstream between Survivors by +2 metres.

addons.name: Diagnostic Tool (Construction)
addons.description:
A device that gives highly accurate information on the lay of the land.
  • The Auras of Survivors picking up an EMP are revealed to you for 8 seconds.

addons.name: Foreign Plant Fibres
addons.description:
Xenobotanists would have a field day with these strange samples of alien plant life.
  • Reduces the duration of the Movement Speed penalty after being stunned by a Pallet during Overclock Mode by -20 %.

addons.name: Soma Family Photo
addons.description:
"A sentimental object that grounds someone to an imagined past."

Survivors afflicted with Temporal Slipstream from a Biopod suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts a -3 % Hindered Status Effect for 6 seconds.
"YOUR ATTACHMENT TO ILLUSIONS IS WEAKNESS." — HUX-A7-13

addons.name: Denied Requisition Form
addons.description:
Despite the advent of light speed technology, it seemed nothing could make bureaucracy any faster.
  • Causes all Survivors to start the Trial infected with Temporal Slipstream.
  • Increases the maximum Printing time of the first batch of EMPs at the start of the Trial by +30 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Crystal Shard
addons.description:
A crystal from the alien structure that gave it sentience.
  • The Auras of Survivors within 10 metres of a newly placed Biopod are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

"HELLO WORLD." — HUX-A7-13

addons.name: Modified Ammo Belt
addons.description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialised weaponry.
Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.
  • Reduces the Reload time of The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Rickety Chain
addons.description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun.
Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.
  • Grants +50 % bonus Bloodpoints for Speared Score Events.
  • Increases the Break-Free speed of Survivors from The Redeemer by +33 %.

addons.name: Snake Oil
addons.description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman.
Purported to cure all that ails you.
  • Increases the Reeling speed of The Redeemer by +2.5 %.

addons.name: Spit Polish Rag
addons.description:
A grimy piece of burlap.
Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the Speargun in the heat of a shootout.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Chewing Tobacco
addons.description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale.
Stimulates the nervous system.
  • Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Jaw Smasher
addons.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout.
It brings back burning desire for revenge.
  • Increases your Movement speed by +1.5 % during Aim Down Sights.

"You called death to your door the instant you done me wrong." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Marshal's Badge
addons.description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang's bounties.
  • Reduces your Terror Radius by -4 metres during Aim Down Sights.

"Get your prayers in, you'll be swinging by noon." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Poison Oak Leaves
addons.description:
An ordinary-looking plant, Caleb found out that spears coated in its oil cause unbearable blistering around wound.
  • Increases the Mending time of Survivors by +1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Rusted Spike
addons.description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity.
The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.
  • Speared Survivors hit with the The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Bayshore's Gold Tooth
addons.description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.
  • Increases the Reeling speed of The Redeemer by +5 %.

"Know your place, boy. Know you damn place." — Henry Bayshore

addons.name: Honey Locust Thorn
addons.description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.
  • Speared Survivors breaking free from the The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Tin Oil Can
addons.description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery.
Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Wanted Poster
addons.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout.
It brings back burning desire for revenge.
  • Increases your Movement speed by +3 % during Aim Down Sights.

"You'll be met with a fierce reckoning, swear it on my mum's grave." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Warden's Keys
addons.description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.
  • Reduces the Reload time of The Redeemer by -0.35 seconds.

addons.name: Barbed Wire
addons.description:
Pliable American-made steel lined with sharp barbs.
Despite its simplicity, Caleb found it could be wrapped around a spear to increase its viciousness.
  • Increases the Mending time of Survivors by +3.5 seconds.

"There won't be nothing to fear soon. Till then, fear me." — Caleb Quinn

addons.name: Bayshore's Cigar
addons.description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb's boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.
  • Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -0.75 seconds.

"Do not point that thing at me, you slack-jawed imbecile." — Henry Bayshore

addons.name: Gold Creek Whiskey
addons.description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb's anger and slowed his step.
  • Reduces your Terror Radius by -8 metres during Aim Down Sights.

"A smooth taste for the rugged frontier." — Gold Creek Advertisement, 1876

addons.name: Prison Chain
addons.description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb's ankle.
It has been re-purposed to hook onto a spear.
  • Increases the Break-Free time of Survivors from The Redeemer by +10 %.

"Inmates working beyond the prison yard must be affixed with a steel ball of no less than 18 pounds." — Hellshire Penitentiary Guard Book

addons.name: Hellshire Iron
addons.description:
The Hellshire Gang's branding iron.
Despite folklore, it never made its mark on new initiates, instead having been used to brand particularly quarrelsome bounties.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect while a Survivor is speared by The Redeemer.
    • This effect lingers for 10 seconds.

"Hellshire Gang: Justice Seekers or Outlaws?" — Glenvale Gazette headline

addons.name: Iridescent Coin
addons.description:
A glass-like coin moulded from The Fog itself.
A payment to the bounty hunter for the services rendered.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect while speared by The Redeemer, if shot from at least 12 metres away.

"Deals made in desperation are paid for in madness."

addons.name: Caffeine Tablets
addons.description:
Stamper's followers were told not to sleep, or they would bring the wrath of Druanee upon them.
Towards the end, he brought in drugs from the mainland.
  • The Auras of locked Lockers are highlighted to you in yellow while charging The Gloaming or teleporting.

addons.name: Follower's Cowl
addons.description:
They believed the cowls proved their enlightenment, but they merely kept them in darkness.
  • Returning to the Remnant triggers Killer Instinct during Daytime.

addons.name: Mortar and Pestle
addons.description:
Disconnected from the world and modern medicine, Stamper's followers originally had to make do with the flora local to the island.
  • You emerge from the Remnant facing your direction at the moment of Teleportation, rather than the one in which you had placed the Remnant.

addons.name: Wooden Plank
addons.description:
A wooden plank torn from the stage where Otto Stamper sacrificed a meddling journalist.
  • Increases the Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for hooking Survivors by +25 %.

addons.name: Air Freshener
addons.description:
After her parents were found, this was in the bag of belongings the police returned.
Haddie does not know why she keeps it.
  • Increases the number of available Power Tokens to 4.

addons.name: Burnt Letters
addons.description:
Some followers tried to write letters home.
Stamper ensured that nobody would have contact with the outside world.
  • Increases the Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for injuring Survivors by +25 %.

addons.name: Fallen Shingle
addons.description:
After the Ottomarians were subsumed by The Dredge, the mansion fell into disrepair.
  • Increases the Charge rate of the Nightfall Meter while using Reign of Darkness by +15 % per second.

addons.name: Haddie's Calendar
addons.description:
She planned to cross out each day until her parents took her to India, but when tragedy struck, she abandoned her calendar.
  • Reduces the Exiting time from locked Lockers by -0.4 seconds.

addons.name: Malthinker's Skull
addons.description:
Those who brought negativity to the commune would mysteriously disappear from time to time.
Their remains were never found... until The Dredge brought them up.
  • Increases the Charge rate of the Nightfall Meter while Survivors are injured by +25 % per second.

addons.name: Broken Doll
addons.description:
Followers brought their families to live in a utopia.
None of them were spared.
  • Increases the duration of Nightfall by +20 seconds.

addons.name: Destroyed Pillow
addons.description:
While not allowed to sleep, leaders amongst the Ottomarians tore sleeping supplies to shreds to prevent malthinkers from sneaking off to nap.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of The Gloaming by -2.5 seconds during Nightfall.

addons.name: Ottomarian Writing
addons.description:
The words of Otto Stamper were the only words available for his followers to read, decrying malthink and malspeak.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of The Gloaming by -2 seconds during Daytime.

addons.name: War Helmet
addons.description:
While investigating an Overlap in the Alps, she found an abandoned war bunker.
She took a helmet from it after the Overlap nearly took her.
  • Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +1.5 seconds during Nightfall.

addons.name: Worry Stone
addons.description:
While the Ottomarians were told to think only positive thoughts, some kept these stones in their pockets to rub when negative thoughts arose.
  • The Auras of Survivors locking a Locker are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Boat Key
addons.description:
Only one boat allowed people on and off the island, and the keys were hidden away to prevent deserters.
  • Increases your Teleportation speed during Daytime by +3 m/s.
  • Causes all active Locks on Lockers to break once the Exit Gates are powered by any means.

addons.name: Field Recorder
addons.description:
Haddie documented all of her forays near Overlaps, to prove not only to the world but herself what she saw and felt.
  • Causes the Trial to start in Nightfall.
  • Causes Nightfall to activate automatically once the last Generator is completed.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds after coming into contact with the Remnant.

addons.name: Lavalier Microphone
addons.description:
She kept a lavalier mic nearby, allowing her to record her innermost feelings when under great stress.
  • The Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for 3 seconds after consuming the last Power Token.
  • Causes all Lockers within 6 metres of Survivors to open and slam their doors when entering them through teleporation.

addons.name: Tilling Blade
addons.description:
The island was self-sufficient, and followers tilled the tough soil to grow crops during the warm season.
  • Survivors suffer from the Blindness, Haemorrhage, and Mangled Status Effects for 80 seconds after becoming injured during Nightfall.

"Like a predatory beast, it can smell and track blood."

addons.name: Iridescent Wooden Plank
addons.description:
Once the journalist's blood stained the wooden boards of the stage, everything was set into motion for The Dredge's arrival.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for the last 12 seconds of Nightfall.

"She came here to poison your minds with fear! Do not let the fear in!" — Otto Stamper

addons.name: Sacrificial Knife
addons.description:
When a journalist attempted to warn the Ottomarians of Stamper's true task, he slit her throat as a warning to any dissenters.
  • Blocks all Vault locations within 16 metres of the Locker you emerge from during Nightfall for 5 seconds.

"There are imposters amongst you! They intend to destroy our perfect home with dark thoughts. Find them and bring them to me!" — Otto Stamper

addons.name: Black Strap
addons.description:
"A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame.
The colour makes it difficult to see the blood-soaked into it."

Modifies Punishement of the Damned with the following effects:

  • Increases its width by +25 %.
  • Reduces its range by -25 %.

addons.name: Copper Ring
addons.description:
"Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital.
It is engraved with a picture of a spider."

Modifies Rites of Judgement with the following effect:

  • Increases its maximum duration by +5 seconds.
"I was locked up inside the basement's basement. It was so small and dark, and I was so afraid. I dropped my precious ring. But I'll never ever go back there."

addons.name: Dead Butterfly
addons.description:
"A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments.
It is frail and nearly falls apart when touched."

Modifies Rites of Judgement with the following effect:

  • Increases its Recharge rate by +10 %.

addons.name: Lead Ring
addons.description:
"Found in a refrigerator.
It is engraved with a disgusting, bloated face."

Modifies Punishment of the Damned with the following effects:

  • Increases its range by +25 %.
  • Reduces its width by -25 %.

addons.name: Cinderella Music Box
addons.description:
"A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella, found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations."

Modifies Punishment of the Damned with the following effect:

  • Reduces its Cool-down time by -10 %.

addons.name: Forgotten Videotape
addons.description:
"A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill.
Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel."

Modifies Punishment of the Damned with the following effect:

  • Increases its Travel speed by +10 %.

addons.name: Leopard-Print Fabric
addons.description:
"A shred of pink, leopard-print fabric.
It is difficult to tell what it was used for."

While using Rites of Judgement, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Reduces the duration of stuns by -15 %.
"It doesn't matter who I am. I'm here for you, James." — Maria

addons.name: Spearhead
addons.description:
"The sharp, rusted tip of a spear.
It is flaked with blood from its last victim."

Survivors rescuing others from a Cage of Atonement suffer from the following effect:

  • Their Aura is revealed to you for 8 seconds.

addons.name: Wax Doll
addons.description:
"A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgement."

Modifies Punishment of the Damned with the following effect:

  • Increases its range by +5 %.

addons.name: Burning Man Painting
addons.description:
"A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel.
Red flames are painted over this place of guilt."

Missed Punishment of the Damned attacks trigger the following effect:

  • The Auras of all Survivors within 3 metres of your current location are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Mannequin Foot
addons.description:
"The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg."

Modifies Torment Trails with the following effect:

  • Causes Survivors to suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 10 seconds upon contact.

addons.name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgement
addons.description:
"A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head.
Victims are caged in the background."

Successful Punishment of the Damned attacks trigger the following effect:

  • Causes the Auras of hit Survivors to be revealed to you for 8 seconds.

addons.name: Tablet of the Oppressor
addons.description:
"A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures."

While using Rites of Judgement, the following effect applies:

  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect.

addons.name: Valtiel Sect Photograph
addons.description:
"A photograph of two figures in red hoods.
Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods."

For each Survivor afflicted by Torment, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Reduces your Terror Radius by a stack-able -2 metres, up to a maximum of -8 metres.

addons.name: Crimson Ceremony Book
addons.description:
"A book about an ancient god. Author unknown."

Successful Punishment of the Damned attacks trigger the following effect:

  • Causes hit Survivors to suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 80 seconds.
"Speak! I am the Crimson One! The lies and the mist are not they, but I!"

addons.name: Lost Memories Book
addons.description:
"A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area."

Successful Punishment of the Damned attacks trigger the following effect:

  • Causes hit Survivors to suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 80 seconds.
"They called this place 'The Place of the Silent Spirits'."

addons.name: Rust-Coloured Egg
addons.description:
"An old-looking egg, coloured reddish orange, about the size of a quail's egg."

Successful Punishment of the Damned attacks trigger the following effect:

  • Recharges Rites of Judgement by +30 %.
"James... you made me happy." — Mary

addons.name: Scarlet Egg
addons.description:
"A fresh egg, strikingly red in colour, about the size of a quail's egg."

Modifies Rites of Judgement with the following effects:

  • While running, Survivors afflicted by Torment create their own Torment Trails trailing after them.
    • These Torment Trails last for 5 seconds.
  • Removes the ability to read the Auras of Torment Trails.
"I've never been so scared in my whole life! You couldn't care less about me... could you?" — Maria

addons.name: Iridescent Seal of Metatron
addons.description:
"A talisman with an odd design inscribed on it.
The Entity's influence seems to have altered it."

Modifies Punishment of the Damned with the following effects:

  • Reduces its base range by -50 %.
  • Increases its range progressively while drawing Torment Trials, up to a maximum +200 %.
    • This effect resets after hitting a Survivor with Punishment of the Damned.
"This magic square, with strong protective and dispelling properties, is called the 'Virun VII Crest' or the 'Seal of Metatron'."

addons.name: Obsidian Goblet
addons.description:
"An ancient looking goblet carved from pure obsidian."

Modifies Punishment of the Damned with the following effects:

  • Grants the ability to destroy Breakable Walls and Pallets upon contact.
  • Increases its cool-down by +20 %.
"Forgive me for waking you. But without you, I just can't go on." — James Sunderland

addons.name: Creature's Bone
addons.description:
It was unlike anything she'd ever seen, and the marrow in its bones was delectable.
  • Reduces the Stun duration of The Dog by -50 %.

addons.name: Sticky Pitch
addons.description:
A vital commodity for keeping a ship in tip-top shape.
  • Increases the bonus Movement speed of The Houndmaster while walking along the Search Path by +2 %.

addons.name: Trainer's Book
addons.description:
Some of the advice contained within helped strengthen their bond.
  • Increases the duration of Houndsense by +35 %.

addons.name: Young Coconut
addons.description:
Her first meal as a castaway, she shared it with her loyal companion.
  • Increases the Chase speed of The Dog by +5 %.

addons.name: Barley Meal
addons.description:
The key ingredient for a bland but reinvigorating porridge.
  • Increases the distance of the Initial Chase Path by +20 %.

addons.name: Belaying Pins
addons.description:
Ideal for holding rope, securing knots, and rigging sails.
  • Causes Survivors affected by Houndsense to also suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 20 seconds.

addons.name: Knotted Rope
addons.description:
The dog's jaws tightened around the makeshift toy, and he thrashed it back and forth.
  • Reduces the Attack cool-down of successful Basic Attacks on Survivors caught in the grasp of The Dog by -2 %.

addons.name: Smoked Snapper
addons.description:
A protein-packed foodstuff, preserved to ensure its quality over long expeditions.
  • Reduces the Power Recharge time by -5 %.

addons.name: Spyglass
addons.description:
Used to spot what one is looking for, no matter how far away.
  • The Auras of Survivors affected by Houndsense are revealed for 3 seconds after it ends.

addons.name: Fatty Meat
addons.description:
A strange and irresistible treat for a canine friend.
  • Survivors affected by Houndsense periodically scream every 15 seconds, but without revealing their location to The Houndmaster.

addons.name: Spiked Collar
addons.description:
A dangerous accessory worn by dogs sent to battle.
  • Causes Survivors becoming injured while they were grabbed by The Dog to suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Training Bell
addons.description:
Even over great distances, it will notify a dog exactly where their owner is.
  • The Aura of the Survivor responsible for stunning The Dog is revealed to you for 8 seconds.

addons.name: Unfinished Map
addons.description:
Features details on the area that would come to be known as the Bermuda Triangle.
  • Causes Survivors affected by Houndsense to also suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Waterskin
addons.description:
She gave him the last of her water, knowing he needed the strength to hunt.
  • Increases the distance of the Redirected Chase Path by +20 %.

addons.name: Gunpowder Tin
addons.description:
Useful for all manner of explosive schemes.
  • Increases the Action speeds for the following interactions by +30 % for 20 seconds after a Survivor becomes affected by Houndsense:
    • Breaking Breakable Walls.
    • Breaking Pallets.
    • Damaging Generators.

addons.name: Leather Harness
addons.description:
Allows greater control over a dog's every movement.

Whenever a Generator is completed, Leather Harness triggers its effect for 30 seconds:

  • Increases the Chase speed of The Dog by +20 %.
Leather Harness applies its effect permanently after all Generators are completed.

addons.name: Marlinspike
addons.description:
As good for unsplicing rope as it is for causing grievous bodily harm.
  • Causes all Survivors within 20 metres of The Dog grabbing a Survivor to become affected by Houndsense.

Marlinspike does not affect the Grabbed Survivor.

addons.name: Ship Figurehead
addons.description:
A trophy torn from the bow of another ship.

The Terror Radius of The Houndmaster changes based on the proximity of The Dog:

  • Increases the Terror Radius by +8 metres while it is following.
  • Reduces the Terror Radius by -8 metres while it is away.

addons.name: Iridescent Wheel Handle
addons.description:
Once used to guide a greast vessel across the open seas, its remnants now serve as a memory of times past.
  • Increases the Linger duration of The Dog at the Target Location of the Search Command by +20 %.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect while The Dog fulfils the Search Command.
    • Touching the Search Path as The Houndmaster immediately removes the Status Effect.

"I fear no obstacle, be it man or storm." — Portia Maye

addons.name: Torn Novel
addons.description:
A book given to her by her father.
All but destroyed after a raid.

While possessing The Dog during the Chase Command to access the Redirect Chase ability, the following effect applies:

  • The Auras of Survivors within 10 metres of The Dog are revealed to you.
    • This effect lingers for 2 seconds after exiting the ability by any means.
"I'll find out who they are... and they'll pay. Every last one." — Portia Maye

addons.name: Inferno Wires
addons.description:
Burnt wires form the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members.
Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.
  • Extends the duration of Main Event by +40 %.

addons.name: Killing Part Chords
addons.description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for.
Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.
  • Increases your Movement speed in the Throw State by +0.04 m/s.

addons.name: Memento Blades
addons.description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse.
Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.
  • Increases the Throw rate of Blades by +10 %.

addons.name: Trick Pouch
addons.description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets.
Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.
  • Increases the number of carried Blades by +4.

addons.name: Caged Heart Shoes
addons.description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart.
Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.
  • Increases your Movement speed in the Throw State by +0.1 m/s.

addons.name: Ji-Woon's Autograph
addons.description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster.
Sore as his wrist was after hundred of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.
  • Increases the time before a Combo ends during Main Event by +10 %.

addons.name: Lucky Blade
addons.description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned.
Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.
  • Increases the duration of Main Event by +0.3 seconds for each successful Blade Hit.

addons.name: On Target Single
addons.description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame.
Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.
  • Increases the Decay delay of the Laceration Meter by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Tequila Moonrock
addons.description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar.
Became a favourite of Ji-Woon's.
  • Increases the duration of Main Event by +60 %.

addons.name: Bloody Boa
addons.description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim's slashed neck.
A number of pockets are concealed within it.
  • Increases the number of carried Blades by +8.

addons.name: Fizz-Spin Soda
addons.description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN.
High sugar and caffeine content.
  • Increases the time before a Combo ends during Main Event by +15 %.

addons.name: Melodious Murder
addons.description:
An audio file of a victim's crisp, clear shriek as a blade opened her up.
Ji-Woon incorporated the sound into one of his more popular tracks.
  • Reduces the Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.

addons.name: Ripper Brace
addons.description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper.
Though unintentional, the design stabilises the wrist better than many medical braces.
  • Increases the Decay delay of the Laceration Meter by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Waiting For You Watch
addons.description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I'll Be Waiting For You.
It is a stage prop that does not work and never will.
  • Increases the duration of Main Event by +0.4 seconds for each successful Blade Hit.

"Don't run away
Don't say we're through
No way to escape thisI'll be waiting for you" — NO SPIN'S "Waiting For You"

addons.name: Cut Thru U Single
addons.description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks.
Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.
  • Causes Blades to pierce through the first Survivor they hit and continue travelling.
    • Any second Survivor hit only receives 0.5 Charges to their Laceration Meter.

"Can't stop this love
That's tearing your heart
Wherever you go
I will cut you apart" — NO SPIN's "Cut Thru U"

addons.name: Diamond Cufflinks
addons.description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon.
Rubbing off the blood, there is so much to be seen in the glitter.
  • The Auras of Survivors one hit away from maximum Laceration are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

"Shhh... you don't have to see your blood anymore." — Ji-Woon Hak

addons.name: Edge of Revival Album
addons.description:
The Trickster's debut album.
The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.
  • Causes Blades to shatter when hitting the environment, adding +0.5 Charges to the Laceration Meter of nearby Survivors.

"Your whisper on me
Warm as can be
Burning each breath
Till I can't breathe" — The Trickster's "Whispers of Warmth"

addons.name: Trick Blades
addons.description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination.
A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the trick he performed.
  • Causes Blades to ricochet off the environment a total of two times.

addons.name: Death Throes Compilation
addons.description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record.
Terrifying and emotionally raw.
  • The Auras of Survivors hit during Main Event are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

"Please, no... don't make it hurt... I can't... I..." — Unidentified Voice

addons.name: Iridescent Photocard
addons.description:
A glass-like photo moulded from The Fog itself.
Ji Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.
  • Grants a stack-able +1 % Haste Status Effect, up to a maximum of +7 %, for each consecutive Blade Hit.
    • This effect is lost when missing a Blade or damaging a Survivor.

"It's okay, scream my name. Let me hear everything the pain awakens..." — Ji-Woon Hak

addons.name: Metal Spoon
addons.description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon.
Confiscated from Room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".
  • Survivors hit by a Special Attack have the volume of their Grunts of Pain increased by +50 % for the next 60 seconds.

addons.name: Plaid Flannel
addons.description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel.
The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.
  • Unlocks the ability to see the Landing zone of the Blink.

addons.name: White Nit Comb
addons.description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic.
Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.
  • Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Blink Attack Score Events.
  • Reduces the Lunge duration of Special Attacks by -0.15 seconds, which reduces your Attack range by -50 %.

addons.name: Wooden Horse
addons.description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse.
Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.
  • Reduces the additional Fatigue applied by missed Special Attacks by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Bad Man Keepsake
addons.description:
A rotten molar ripped from the "Cataontic Boy's" cold dead hand.
Normally stable and calm, it becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
  • Survivors hit with a Special Attack have their Auras revealed to you, if they are healing or being healed within 28 metres of your location for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Catatonic Boy's Treasure
addons.description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement.
Taken from the "Catatonic Boy's" body.
  • Reduces the additional Fatigue applied by Chain Blinks by -65 %.

addons.name: Dark Cincture
addons.description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning.
Taken from Father Campbell's body.
  • Increases your Movement speed during the Chain Blink Window by +30 %.

addons.name: Dull Bracelet
addons.description:
A worthless piece of jewellery that might have an important significance to someone.
Taken from the "Anxious Girl's" body.
  • Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Precise Blink Score Events.
  • Reduces the maximum range of the Blink by -20 %.

addons.name: Pocket Watch
addons.description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces.
Taken from Nurse Moris' body.
  • Increases the duration of the Chain Blink Window by +0.2 seconds.

addons.name: Anxious Gasp
addons.description:
The gasp of surprise collected from the asylum patient Mary Jenner, also known as the "Anxious Girl" that The Nurse was fond of.
Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.
  • Coming within 1 metre of Survivors while teleporting causes them to scream and reveal their location.
  • Grants 200 Bloodpoints in the Deviousness Category.

addons.name: Ataxic Respiration
addons.description:
The irregular and deteriorating breath collected from the asylum patient known as the "Catatonic Boy".
Normally stable and calm, it becomes incredibly agitated at The Nurse's touch.
  • Reduces the duration of Fatigue by -7 %.

addons.name: Fragile Wheeze
addons.description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell.
Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.
  • Survivors hit with a Special Attack suffer from the Mangled Status Effect for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Heavy Panting
addons.description:
The slow and bulging breath stolen from Harvey Kavanagh, the asylum's "Fat Orderly".
Dimly oscillates at The Nurse's touch.
  • Extends the Lunge duration of Special Attacks to 130 %, which increases your Attack range by +30 %.
    • This effect only applies after the second or third Blink.

addons.name: Spasmodic Breath
addons.description:
The twitchy and tremulous breath stolen from the "Bad Man".
Aggressively pulses and jumps at The Nurse's touch.

Hitting a Survivor with a Special Attack causes the following effects for 60 seconds:

  • Increases your Movement speed to 4.6 m/s.
  • Disables your Power.

addons.name: "Bad Man's" Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum patient known as the "Bad Man".
In the hands of The Nurse, it jolts with intensity.
  • Hitting Survivors with a Special Attack grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.

"Bad Man's" Last Breath" has a cool-down of 45 seconds.

addons.name: Campbell's Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum priest Father Campbell.
In the hand of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.
  • Reappearing from a fully charged Blink, you automatically Blink at full charge in the direction you are facing.
    • This requires that you have at least 1 Charge left after the initial Blink.

addons.name: Jenner's Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum patient Mary Jenner, also known as the "Anxious Girl".
In the hands of The Nurse, it trembles with intensity.
  • After exhausting all of your Blinks, but before succumbing to Fatigue, press the Active Ability button to immediately Blink back to your starting location.
  • Recharges your Power by +1 Charge.

addons.name: Kavanagh's Last Breath
addons.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from the asylum orderly Harvey Kavanagh, also known as the "Fat Orderly".
In the hands of The Nurse, it wobbles with intensity.
  • When succumbing to Fatigue, all Survivors within 8 metres of your location suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Matchbox
addons.description:
A matchbox containing an odd collection of mismatched buttons.
Serves as a reminder of a horrible place.
  • Increases your Movement speed to 4.4 m/s for the entire Trial.
  • Restricts your Power to just 1 Blink.
    • This cannot be altered by other Add-ons.

addons.name: Torn Bookmark
addons.description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book.
Serves as the symbol of a dispute.
  • Increases the number of available Power Tokens by +1.
  • Increases the Power Recharge time to 130 %.

addons.name: Bent Nail
addons.description:
A simple nail that cut deep into Larry Cotton's hand.
Though the damage was superficial, it set into motion a horrifying set of events.
  • Grants +100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Chain Bound Score Events.
  • Reduces the number of bonus Chains spawned when Survivors are hit with a Possessed Chain Attack to +1.

addons.name: Burning Candle
addons.description:
A candle lit by Frank Cotton during a fatal summoning ceremony.
  • Reduces the Timer duration for starting a Chain Hunt by -3 seconds.

addons.name: Leather Strip
addons.description:
Leather strips torn from a Cenobite's uniform, allowing for the mutilation of exposed flesh.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of a Possessed Chain Attack by -0.15 seconds.

addons.name: Lively Crickets
addons.description:
Insects which scarcely avoided being eaten by a mysterious drifter.
  • Increases the Turn rate of the Possessed Chain by +10 %.

addons.name: Flickering Television
addons.description:
A television that acted strangely upon the arrival of the Cenobites.
  • Increases the maximum Casting distance of the Gateway by +4 metres.

addons.name: Liquified Gore
addons.description:
The result of summoning the Cenobites.
There is no telling what part of the human body this belonged to.
  • Increases the Solving time of the Lament Configuration by +1 second.

addons.name: Skewered Rat
addons.description:
A crude solution for the Cotton home's rat problem.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of a Possessed Chain Attack by -0.45 seconds.

addons.name: Spoiled Meal
addons.description:
A pile of mould, feasted on by a cockroach.
Perhaps a sign of Frank Cotton's mysterious disappearance...
  • Increases the maximum range of the Possessed Chain by +2 metres.

addons.name: Wriggling Maggots
addons.description:
Larvae that poured from the mouth of a corpse hidden in the Cotton household.
  • Increases the Turn rate of the Possessed Chain by +15 %.

addons.name: Frank's Heart
addons.description:
The beating heart of Frank, given life from his brother's blood.
  • Increases the maximum Casting distance of the Gateway by +8 metres.

"Nobody escapes us." — Pinhead

addons.name: Larry's Blood
addons.description:
The blood of Larry Cotton, which partially resurrected his brother Frank.
  • Increases the maximum range of the Possessed Chain by +4 metres.

addons.name: Larry's Remains
addons.description:
The skeletal remains of Larry Cotton, covered in a thick, sticky layer of blood.
  • Increases the Solving time of the Lament Configuration by +2 seconds.

"We want the man who did this." — Pinhead

addons.name: Slice of Frank
addons.description:
A slab of Frank's face after his torture at the hand of the Cenobites.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect while carrying the Lament Configuration.

"The Cenobites gave me an experience beyond limits. Pain and pleasure, indivisible." — Frank Cotton

addons.name: Torture Pillar
addons.description:
A dangling slab covered in the gore of past victims.
  • Reduces the Timer duration for starting a Chain Hunt by -6 seconds.

"This isn't for your eyes." — Pinhead

addons.name: Chatterer's Tooth
addons.description:
A fragment from a Cenobite whose mouth chatters endlessly.
This tooth, having broken from his jaw, is finally silent.
  • Grants the ability to see the Aura of the Lament Configuration.
  • Picking up the Lament Configuration deactivates an on-going Chain Hunt and grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.

addons.name: Greasy Black Lens
addons.description:
A lens from the sunglasses of an obese Cenobite whose fleshy rolls droop down his face and neck.
  • The Auras of Survivors are revealed to for 6 seconds after hitting them with a Possessed Chain Attack.

addons.name: Impaling Wire
addons.description:
A wire that pierces the cheeks of a Cenobite, while revealing the gaping wound on her neck.
  • Causes a bonus Chain to spawn on Bound Survivors, when they use the environment to break one.

addons.name: Original Pain
addons.description:
"The first pin pushed into Pinhead's skull.
Such pleasure and pain."

Survivors breaking free from the Possessed Chain suffer from the following effect:

  • Their Aura is revealed to you for 8 seconds.
"No tears, please. It's a waste of good suffering." — Pinhead

addons.name: Engineer's Fang
addons.description:
A sharp tooth from the maw of a fleshy, scorpion-like creature, known to accompany Cenobites on their grim undertakings.
  • Causes healthy Survivors to become injured when hit with a Possessed Chain Attack, but does not bind them with additional Chains.
    • This increases the Closing time of the Gateway by +0.25 seconds.
  • Reduces the number of bonus Chains spawned when injured Survivors are hit with a Possessed Chain Attack to +1.

"We have such sights to show you." — Pinhead

addons.name: Iridescent Lament Configuration
addons.description:
A glass-like puzzle box moulded from The Fog itself.
This replica differs from the original, providing altogether new powers.
  • Shields the Aura of the Lament Configuration from Survivors who are farther than 24 metres from it outside of a Chain Hunt.

"You opened it. We came." — Pinhead

addons.name: Bead Maze
addons.description:
"A developmental toy used to enrich the minds of captive children."

Modifies Worldbreaker with the following effect:

  • The second phase of the Worldbreaker Timer is increased by 3 seconds for each living Survivor.

addons.name: Orderly ID
addons.description:
"Bears the face of Henry Creel as he appeared before he was changed by another dimension."

Modifies Vine Attack with the following effect:

  • While not in Worldbreaker mode, the aiming range is increased by 2 meters.

addons.name: Shattered Wrist Rocket
addons.description:
"A once-powerful slingshot, now laid to ruin."

Modifies Undergate Attack with the following effect:

  • The explosion from the Undergate Attack breaks Pallets instantly and damages Generators.

addons.name: Stained Glass Mural
addons.description:
"A design once found on the Creel family door. Now it darkens the door of another dimension."

Modifies The Upside Down with the following effect:

  • While on cooldown, breaking Pallets and Breakable Wallsdecreases that cooldown by 12 seconds.

addons.name: Bloody Roller Skate
addons.description:
"A memento of the fury that Eleven was capable of."

Modifies the Undergate Attack with the following effect:

  • Grants the 20 % Haste Status Effect for 2 seconds.

addons.name: Clock Hands
addons.description:
"Hands of the Creel family's grandfather clock, corrupted by Henry's dark power."

Modifies the Grandfather Clocks with the following effect:

  • Causes Survivors to gain the Oblivious Status Effect while interacting with the Grandfather Clocks and for 12 seconds after.

addons.name: Gutted Supercom
addons.description:
"A broken communication device that now crackles to life at the most terrifying times."

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability while using Vine Attack:

  • The Aura of a Survivor hit by Vine Attack is revealed to you for 1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Mid-Century Radio
addons.description:
"It sat silent in the Creel's dining room until the slaughter was about to begin."

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability while using Worldbreaker:

  • Survivors more than 32 meters away have their Auras revealed while interacting with Grandfather Clocks.

addons.name: Smashed Cassette Deck
addons.description:
"They once used music to escape Henry's grasp. Without it, they do not stand a chance."

Modifies Worldbreaker with the following effect:

  • All Survivors start with one Worldbreaker token. When Worldbreaker is activated for the first time, all Survivors lose their Worldbreaker token. 1 less Grandfather Clock appears on the map.

addons.name: Electrode Cap
addons.description:
"Used to measure the brain's activity. In the lab, nothing goes unnoticed."

Modifies Worldbreaker with the following effect:

  • At the start of the second phase, Survivors more than 26 meters away have their Auras revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Forged Death Certificate
addons.description:
"A piece of paper used to prove the death of a powerful person who was very much alive."

Modifies Vine Attack with the following effect:

  • Each Worldbreaker Token placed on a Survivor reduces your Terror Radius by 12 meters until the next Worldbreaker Mode activation.

addons.name: Neck Tendril
addons.description:
"He was furious when the tendril was torn from his neck as Max escaped his mind realm."

Modifies Vine Attack with the following effect:

  • While in Worldbreaker mode, Survivors hit by Vine Attack gain the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects for 70 seconds.

addons.name: Rabbit Remains
addons.description:
"Before massacring his family, Henry started small, killing rabbits and leaving their corpses strewn about town."

Modifies Undergate Attack with the following effect:

  • Survivors standing in or entering the area of effect range gain the Exhausted Status Effect and for 20 seconds after.

addons.name: Victor's Razor Blade
addons.description:
"In his own grief, Henry's father used a hidden blade to take out his own eyes."

Modifies Worldbreaker with the following effect:

  • Upon ending, injured Survivors gain the Broken Status Effect for 20 seconds.

addons.name: Black Widow Spider
addons.description:
"A terrifying spider that is no longer a mere hallucination."

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability while using The Upside Down:

  • The Aura of the furthest survivor more than 36 meters is revealed to you for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Broken Skateboard
addons.description:
"A cool way to get around, smashed by a furious brother as a means of control."

Modifies Worldbreaker with the following effect:

  • Upon Activation, increases vaulting speed by 30 % for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Electroshock Collar
addons.description:
"A cruelly efficient way of training and punishing the facility's prisoners."

Modifies The Upside Down with the following effect:

  • When exiting, all Vault locations within 32 meters are blocked for 12 seconds.

addons.name: Pizza Goggles
addons.description:
"Used while Eleven entered sensory deprivation, they rid the user of distractions and focus the mind."

Modifies Undergate Attack with the following effect:

  • The area of effect range is reduced by 90 %, and it's cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

addons.name: Chess Piece
addons.description:
"One of the few forms of entertainment while in the facility, it helped the students learn logic and tactics."

Modifies the Vine Attack with the following effect:

  • Gains two charges, and has it's attack radius reduced by 50 %

Modifies the Upside Down Ability with the following effect:

  • Increases the cooldown by 15 seconds

addons.name: Iridescent Soteria Chip
addons.description:
"A chip that once limited his powers is now a source of even greater power."

Modifies Worldbreaker with the following effect:

  • Upon activation, grants the Undetectable Status Effect and the Auras of Survivors with at least one Worldbreaker Token are revealed to you when they are within 12 meters. This lasts until you perform a Vine Attack, enter The Upside Down, or when Worldbreaker ends.

addons.name: Brian's Intestine
addons.description:
The small intestine of Brian Irons, chief of the RPD.
It is an appetising sight for zombies.
  • Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +0.25 m/s.

addons.name: Damaged Syringe
addons.description:
Medical equipment that fared poorly during the chaos that overwhelmed Raccoon City.
  • Increases the Injection time of Vaccines by +5 seconds.

addons.name: S.T.A.R.S. Field Combat Manual
addons.description:
A manual of compiled S.T.A.R.S. close-range combat knowledge, edited by Chris Redfield.
  • The Auras of Zombies are highlighted to you in yellow for 6 seconds when they hit a Survivor.

addons.name: Visitor Wristband
addons.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for visitors to the facility.
It also doubles as a tracking device.
  • Increases the Survivor-Detection range of the Zombies by +2 metres.
  • Increases the Field of View of the Zombies by +10 °.

addons.name: Admin Wristband
addons.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for administrators of the facility.
While allowing access to secure areas, it also doubles as a tracking device.
  • Increases the Survivor-Detection range of the Zombies by +4 metres.
  • Increases the Field of View of the Zombies by +17.5 °.

addons.name: Adrenaline Injector
addons.description:
A hormone that heightens senses and prepares the body to fight.
  • Increases the Duration of Killer Instinct after a Survivor uses a Vaccine by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Marvin's Blood
addons.description:
The contaminated blood of a Raccoon City Police Officer.
  • Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Survivors with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.5 points.

"All you need to know is that this place will eat you alive if you're not careful." — Marvin Branagh

addons.name: Mikhail's Eye
addons.description:
While little was left of Mikhail, his left eyeball survived the blast that killed him.
It remains a tasty treat for zombies.
  • Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +0.35 m/s.

addons.name: Zombie Heart
addons.description:
The heart of an eviscerated zombie.
It is considered hazardous waste as it is certainly teeming with viruses.
  • Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.75 points.

"Words won't work on this thing." — Leon Scott Kennedy

addons.name: Licker Tongue
addons.description:
A sticky prehensile tongue that easily wraps around anything it touches.

Survivors becoming Contaminated suffer from the following effect:

  • Increases the duration of the Hindered Status Effect by +1 second to 3 seconds.
"It's like... a nightmare." — Claire Redfield

addons.name: Plant 43 Vines
addons.description:
The tangled remnants of a plant infected with the T-Virus, it killed one of the researchers who developed it.
  • Increases the Opening time of Supply Cases by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Serotonin Injector
addons.description:
A hormone that slightly relaxes the user for when stealth is required.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds, after a Zombie is disintegrated by any means.

addons.name: T-Virus Sample
addons.description:
A sample of the T-Virus developed by Umbrella Corporation, it causes extreme mutations and brain damage in its subjects.
  • Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +1 point.

addons.name: Tyrant Gore
addons.description:
A damaged sample from a T-002 Tyrant that died in combat.
There are signs of severe burns.
  • Reduces the Respawn time of disintegrated Zombies by -7.5 seconds.
  • Increases the Gain to Mutation Rate after hitting Zombies with a Tentacle Strike Attack by +0.75 points.

addons.name: Broken Recovery Coin
addons.description:
A coin depicting a bird framed by a laurel wreath.
It is broken in half.
  • Reduces the number of Supply Cases in the environment by -1.

"This is not how I imagined my first day." — Leon Scott Kennedy

addons.name: Depleted Ink Ribbon
addons.description:
Who will save them now? There is something about this ink ribbon being dry that energises zombies.
  • Reduces the Respawn time of disintegrated Zombies by -5 seconds.
  • Increases the Movement speed of Zombies by +0.5 m/s.
  • Once the Exit Gates are powered, disintegrated Zombies respawn in the Exit area.

"Look, just so you know... this is the last fucking time." — Jill Valentine

addons.name: Jill's Sandwich
addons.description:
It is tragically squished and dripping with blood from a recent battle.
Despite that, it has a delicious aroma that cannot be missed.
  • The Auras of Survivors unlocking a Supply Case are revealed to you for 12 seconds after they succeed.

addons.name: Ne-α Parasite
addons.description:
A parasite used in the development of Nemesis T-Types, it is capable of hijacking its host's brain.
  • Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds after becoming Contaminated, or until they cure themselves with a Vaccine.

addons.name: Iridescent Umbrella Badge
addons.description:
A glass-like badge moulded from The Fog itself.
It represents a corporation that pushed far beyond ethical and humane science.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 60 seconds after using a Vaccine.

"Commitment, honesty, integrity. These are the core values that create the foundation of Umbrella Corp." — Doctor Matt Gorkis

addons.name: Shattered S.T.A.R.S. Badge
addons.description:
A symbol of hope for Raccoon City, utterly destroyed.
  • Increases the Movement Speed of Zombies by +1.5 m/s for 60 seconds each time a Generator is completed.

"S.T.A.R.S..." — The Nemesis

addons.name: Broken Tiara
addons.description:
"A dazzling stage prop worn by a Pharoah's daughter, as distracting as it is fake."

Modifies the Glowing Fungus with the following effect:

  • Causes Survivors to suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect while under its effects.

addons.name: First Libretto
addons.description:
"She felt as if she could walk on air after landing a role in her first opera."

Whenever you hook a Survivor afflicted with Leeched, you benefit from the following effect:

  • Reduces the Consumption rate of Headlong Flight by -30 % for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Luckless Mouse
addons.description:
"A game of cat and mouse always gets the blood pumping."

Modifies Headlong Flight with the following effect:

  • Increases its Charge capacity by +2 Charges.

addons.name: Sticky Lozenge
addons.description:
"A simple tablet to moisten a dry throat, often taken before an audition."

Modifies Regurgitate with the following effect:

  • Displays a preview of the impact zone while charging it.

addons.name: Chunk of Malai
addons.description:
"A varied source of protein contributes to good gut health."

Modifies the Glowing Fungus with the following effect:

  • Incurs a stack-able -8 % Efficiency penalty per Leeched Survivor to its Depletion rate of the Leech Meter, up to a maximum of -32 %.

addons.name: Crumpled Sheet Music
addons.description:
"Before her desperation, she hoped that continued practice would be enough to succeed."

Successfully hitting a Survivor with a Leeching Gland triggers the following effect:

  • Causes Headlong Flight to instantly gain +12 Charges.

addons.name: Defective Metronome
addons.description:
"The metronome sparks as it plays at a frenetic pace."

Modifies the Glowing Fungus with the following effect:

  • Causes Survivors to suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect while under its effects.

addons.name: Pig's Eye
addons.description:
"It still glistens with saliva."

Modifies the Glowing Fungus with the following effect:

  • Survivors eating it while at least 40 metres from your current location have their Auras revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Wriggling Parasite
addons.description:
"A fragile organism that has an unusual effect on its host."

Modifies the Leech Meter with the following effects:

  • Increases its Charge rate by +16 %.

addons.name: Dulled Knife
addons.description:
"A stage prop, symbolic of a woman's gambit in an attempt to save her lover on death's row."

Modifies Headlong Flight with the following effect:

  • Reduces its Consumption rate by -25 %.
Modifies the Glowing Fungus with the following effects:
  • Causes Survivors eating it to benefit from the following additional effects for 5 seconds:
    • Grants a +5 % Haste Status Effect and the Elusive Status Effect.

addons.name: Framed Newspaper
addons.description:
"She had once made it onto the entertainment section of the city's newspaper, but she wanted more."

Modifies Headlong Flight with the following effects:

  • Increases its Charge capacity by +6 Charges.
  • Increases its Recharge rate by +15 %.
  • Raises its Activation threshold to 50 %.

addons.name: Janjira's Hand
addons.description:
"One of the few distinguishable parts that remained of her friend."

Whenever a Generator is completed, Janjira's Hand triggers its primary effects:

  • Causes Headlong Flight to instantly gain +2 Charges.
  • Increases its Recharge rate by +25 % for 15 seconds.
Once the last Generator is completed, Janjira's Hand triggers its secondary effects:
  • Instantly recharges Headlong Flight.
  • Increases its Recharge rate by +25 % for the remainder of the Trial.

addons.name: Spattered Handkerchief
addons.description:
"A sign that something was very wrong presented itself, but she chose to ignore it."

Once the Exit Gates are powered, Spattered Handkerchief triggers the following effects:

  • Causes all remaining Survivors to suffer from Leeched I.
  • Causes all remaining Glowing Fungi to start decaying.
  • Activating Corporeal Weave no longer spawns a new Glowing Fungus.

addons.name: Theatre Binoculars
addons.description:
"A pair of glasses that have watched many tragedies."

Successfully hitting a Survivor not currently afflicted with Leeched with an Intestinal Whip attack triggers the following effect:

  • The Auras of all other Survivors within 24 metres are revealed to you for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Lorenza's Remains
addons.description:
"Even her pet bird would fall victim to The Krasue's thirst for blood."

Survivors afflicted with Leeched also suffer from the following effects:

  • Tier I: Blindness Status Effect.
  • Tier II: -4 % Hindered Status Effect.

addons.name: Mysterious Elixir
addons.description:
"A liquid moulded from The Fog itself.
Though similar to the concotion she drank, there seem to be slight alterations."

Modifies Regurgitate with the following effect:

  • Hitting Windows with a Leeching Gland causes them to become Marked.
    • This effect can affect multiple objects at a time.
Vaulting a Marked Window by any means triggers the following effect:
  • Blocks it for 10 seconds and removes its Mark.

addons.name: Queen's Sceptre
addons.description:
"The stage prop of a vengeful queen who demands blood."

Successfully hitting a Survivor with an Intestinal Whip attack triggers the following effect:

  • Causes a Leeching Gland to spatter from their location.

addons.name: Rotten Swine
addons.description:
"A revolting meal that left her disgusted when she awoke."

Modifies Regurgitate with the following effect:

  • Hitting Breakable Walls, Generators, or Pallets with a Leeching Gland causes them to become Marked.
    • This effect can only affect a single object at a time.
While interacting with the Marked Prop, you benefit from the following effect:
  • Increases the Action speed for Breaking and Damaging by +15 %.

addons.name: Chicken Head
addons.description:
"Believed by some to have mystical properties, this particular sample was lodged in The Krasue's throat after a feed."

Modifies Unbodied Flesh with the following effects:

  • All Survivors are afflicted with Leeched I at the start of the Trial.
  • Increases the initial count of Glowing Fungus by +2.

addons.name: Shredded Gown
addons.description:
"She tore at her clothes and into her flesh as her body burned."

Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability while using Corporeal Weave:

  • The Auras of all Survivors who are either within 8 metres of a Glowing Fungus or holding one are revealed to you for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Blurry Photo
addons.description:
"The photo was found at an abandoned campsite.
The campers were never seen again."

Modifies the Teleport ability with the following effect:

  • Increases the Recovery rate back to full Movement speed after Teleportation by +7 %.

addons.name: Punctured Eyeball
addons.description:
"The station was a scene of madness.
The officers had seemingly turned on each other."

Survivors performing the Dispelling action successfully while both injured and in the Weakened State suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts the Deep Wound Status Effect.

addons.name: Rabbit's Foot
addons.description:
"The unlucky creature's remains were found by a tree, its intestines wedged between its teeth."

While charging UVX, you benefit from the following primary effect:

  • Pools of Blood are highlighted in bright red.
Survivors damaged by UVX suffer from the following secondary effect:
  • Inflicts the Haemorrhage Status Effect for 45 seconds.

addons.name: Sketch Attempt
addons.description:
"The victim’s child was given paper and crayons at the station, while he waited for his father to pick him up."

Survivors in the Blast Area of the UVX Projectile suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts the Oblivious Status Effect for 20 seconds.

addons.name: Device of Undisclosed Origin
addons.description:
"Was the thing made on Earth? Or somewhere else entirely?"

While within range of seeing the Aura of a Hallucination, Survivors suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts the Oblivious Status Effect.

addons.name: Last Known Recording
addons.description:
"She studied Musique Concrète before she disappeared, her screams the last sound on the tape."

Modifies Hallucinations with the following effect:

  • Reduces the range at which Survivors can see their Auras by -35 %.

addons.name: Notebook of Theories
addons.description:
"His studio apartment was empty and reeked of black mould.
The book was the only thing left."

Survivors hit by an airborne UVX Projectile suffer from the following effect:

  • Increases the duration of the Hindered Status Effect by +2 seconds to 5 seconds.

addons.name: Slashed Backpack
addons.description:
"When the hiker was rescued from the mountain pass, she insisted her companion would never wander off alone."

Hitting a Hallucination with the UVX Projectile triggers the following effects:

  • Causes the Hallucination to disintegrate, creating a Blast Area.
  • Reduces the Spawn timer of your next Hallucination by -65 %.

addons.name: Victim's Map
addons.description:
"He thought the key to solving the mystery lay beyond the forest, and feared he would never return."

Survivors performing the Stare Down The Unknown action successfully suffer from the following effect:

  • Triggers Killer Instinct for 3 seconds.

addons.name: B-Movie Poster
addons.description:
"The movie was rumored to be state-funded propaganda, made specifically for something called Project Apple-Pie."

Survivors damaged by UVX suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts the Broken Status Effect for 30 seconds.

addons.name: Footprint Cast
addons.description:
"The cast sits in the Museum of the Weird in Sarasota, Florida and has long since been debunked."

Whenever a Survivor enters the Weakened State, Footprint Cast triggers its effect:

  • Reduces the Spawn timer of the next Hallucination by -15 seconds.

addons.name: Front-Page Article
addons.description:
"The assailant had torn gaping holes in the walls of the cabin, and drove the family into the woods."

Whenever you break a Breakable Wall or a dropped Pallet, Front-Page Article triggers its effect:

  • Reduces the Spawn timer of the next Hallucination by -50 %.

addons.name: Hypnotist's Watch
addons.description:
"Hypnotherapy was recommended to recover repressed memories.
What emerged from his mind would be his undoing."

Survivors hit by an airborne UVX Projectile suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Vanishing Box
addons.description:
"The magician was popular at children's parties, and quickly became the top suspect."

Modifies UVX with the following primary effect:

  • Increases the default value of the Spawn timer of Hallucinations by +120 %.
Whenever one or multiple Survivors complete a Generator, Vanishing Box triggers its secondary effect:
  • Causes all participating Survivors to enter the Weakened State.

addons.name: Discarded Milk Carton
addons.description:
"She decided to take the long way home, and waved goodbye to her friends before parting ways."

Modifies UVX with the following effects:

  • Doubles the Bounce strength of the UVX Projectile by changing the following:
    • Increases Bounciness by +8 %.
    • Reduces Friction by -15 %.

addons.name: Homemade Mask
addons.description:
"The killer had made the mask in the shed in his backyard, where he would bring the others when the sun went down."

Survivors performing the Dispelling action successfully suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Obscure Game Cartridge
addons.description:
"Some maintained Project Apple-Pie evolved over time, turning to new forms of media for results."

After teleporting to a Hallucination, Obscure Game Cartridge triggers its effect for 20 seconds:

  • Increases the Action speeds for Breaking, Damaging, and Vaulting by +30 %.

addons.name: Serum Vial
addons.description:
"The molecular structure of the substance was synthesised in the lab, but its effects could never be replicated."

Upon entering the range of seeing the Aura of a Hallucination, Survivors suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Captured by the Dark
addons.description:
"The documentary purported that the disappearances were linked to small-town cinemas.
Audiences left the theater feeling uneasy."

Modifies UVX with the following effects:

  • All Survivors start the Trial in the Weakened State.
  • Reduces the number of Hallucinations that can exist at the same time by 1.

addons.name: Iridescent OSS Report
addons.description:
"The report was redacted to the point of being meaningless.
But still, theorists tried to extract meaning from it."

Modifies UVX with the following effects:

  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of the Teleport ability by -5 seconds.
  • Increases the Lifetime of Decoys by +10 seconds.
  • Causes Decoys to emit a Terror Radius and Red Stain.

addons.name: Cerberus Talon
addons.description:
"A sharp memento from one of Dracula's most terrifying guards."

Modifies the Scent Orbs with the following effect:

  • Increases their Aura-Reveal distance by +100 %.

addons.name: Clock Tower Gear
addons.description:
"A piece of the great clock tower, a reminder of the inevitability of time itself."

Modifies the Shapeshift ability with the following effect:

  • Reduces its Cool-down time by -5 %.

addons.name: Ruby Circlet
addons.description:
"An enchanted headpiece that brings even the mightiest of flames to heel."

Modifies the Hellfire attack with the following effect:

  • Reduces its Cool-down duration by -5 %.

addons.name: Traveller's Hat
addons.description:
"A wide-brimmed hat that once belonged to a well-travelled man."

Modifies the Shapeshift ability with the following effect:

  • Reduces the Transition time between Forms by -5 %.

addons.name: Blood-Filled Goblet
addons.description:
"The blood of his victims sustains him and makes him an even greater hunter."

Modifies the Scent Orbs with the following effect:

  • Extends their Lifetime by +60 %.

addons.name: Magical Ticket
addons.description:
"A strange artifact once used to transport across Dracula's castle."

Modifies the Teleport ability with the following effect:

  • Increases the Teleporation speed by +10 %.

addons.name: Moonstone Necklace
addons.description:
"A simple necklace by day, but its power comes to life in the dark."

Modifies the Vampire Form and the Wolf Form with the following effect:

  • Reduces the Terror Radius by -8 metres.

addons.name: White Wolf Medallion
addons.description:
"A trinket once used to call a great spirit guide."

Modifies Wolf Form with the following effect:

  • Increases its Killer Instinct duration by +1 second.

addons.name: Winged Boots
addons.description:
"Long used by their wearers to move quickly."

Modifies the Teleport ability with the following effect:

  • Increases its Teleportation range by +20 %.

addons.name: Force of Echo
addons.description:
"An artifact that grants bats even greater senses in the dark."

Modifies the Scent Orbs with the following effect:

  • Increases their Spawn rate by +10 %.

addons.name: Killer Doll
addons.description:
"One of Dracula's minions, and a reminder that all are his playthings."

Modifies the Pounce attack with the following effect:

  • Increases the Cool-down bonus from collecting Scent Orbs by +30 %.

addons.name: Pocket Watch
addons.description:
"A tool that bends the rules of time itself."

Modifies the Teleport ability with the following effect:

  • Instantly recharges it after breaking a Pallet.

addons.name: Sunglasses
addons.description:
"They protect against bright lights, in addition to looking cool."

Modifies the Hellfire attack with the following effects:

  • Increases the number of Pillars of Flame by 1.
  • Increases its Charge time by +25 %.

addons.name: Sylph Feather
addons.description:
"An enchanted feather that grants its holder great agility."

Whenever you break a Pallet, Sylph Feather gains +1 Token, up to a maximum of 5 Tokens:

  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of the Hellfire attack by a stack-able -5 % per Token, up to a limit of -25 %.

addons.name: Cube of Zoe
addons.description:
"A strange box whose presence creates something from nothing."

Whenever a Generator is completed, Cube of Zoe triggers its effect for 10 seconds:

  • Causes the immediate area around The Dark Lord to continuously spawn Pillars of Flame.

addons.name: Lapis Lazuli
addons.description:
"A stone said to bring luck to its holders, or take it from their enemies."

After teleporting to a Window, Lapis Lazuli triggers its effect:

  • Calls upon The Entity to block it to all Survivors for 8 seconds.

addons.name: Medusa's Hair
addons.description:
"A snakelike memento from one of Dracula's most ancient and fearsome minions."

Causes all Survivors within 8 metres of your Teleport destination to suffer from the following effect:

  • Inflicts a -8 % Hindered Status Effect for 4 seconds.

addons.name: Warg's Fang
addons.description:
"A mighty tool of destruction taken from one of Dracula's most dangerous allies."

While in Wolf Form , whenever the Pounce attack becomes available, you benefit from the following effect:

  • The Auras of all Survivors whose Scent Orbs you have collected are revealed to you for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Alucard's Shield
addons.description:
"A family heirloom that blocks its bearer's enemies at every turn."

Whenever an Exit Gate is opened, Alucard's Shield triggers its effect:

  • Causes the area inside the Exit Gate to continuously spawn Pillars of Flame.
"Oh, but this world invited me. Your own kind called me forth with praise and tribute." — Dracula

addons.name: Iridescent Ring of Vlad
addons.description:
"A unique relic belonging to Dracula. It is said none can approach the Dark Lord without it."
